K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:1b-1: a'arya badzra p'a ni aa bhi she ka ma h'a tantra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:1b-2: bod skad du; 'phags pa lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i rgyud chen po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:1b-5: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:1b-6: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:2a-0: bcom ldan 'das lha'i rgyal po dbang @2a #//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:2a-1: bsgyur gyi khang pa chen po rnam par smin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa las mngon par grub pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:2a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod pa'i rgyu mthun pa'i rin po che'i rgyal po chen pos shin tu rnam par spras pa'i khang bzang chen po rin po che'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i khang pa na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:2b-0: padma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri chen po; nor bu chen po dbang gi rgyal pos ngos gnyis rnam par spras pa la bzhugs nas @2b lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:2b-3: nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ni nam mthong ba'i nam mkha' la lham me lhan ne lhang nge'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:2b-4: de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das kyang padma'i snying po'i seng ge'i khri chen po de la lham me lhan ne lhang nger bzhugs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:2b-5: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen pos kun nas bskor te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:2b-6: sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni brnyes /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:2b-9: thugs ni mnyam par byin gyis brlabs /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:2b-11: rlom sems thams cad dang ni bral zhing lhun gyis grub par sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa la 'jug cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:2b-13: lus mnyam pa nyid kyi gnas zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:3a-0: ngag mnyam pa nyid kyi gnas @3a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:3a-1: zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:3a-2: de bzhin du yid mnyam pa nyid kyi gnas zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos ston to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:3a-3: de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:3a-6: yid mnyam pa nyid kyi bkod pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:3a-7: ting nge 'dzin de thob pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:3a-8: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad de nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul phra rab kyi rdul snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:3a-9: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:3b-2: yid mnyam pa nyid kyi gnas bkod pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi chos ston pa dag mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:3b-4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la la dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:3b-5: me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:3b-6: 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams du ma nges par ston pa 'di ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:3b-7: byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:3b-8: spyod pa la nan tan byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:3b-10: byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:3b-11: chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:3b-12: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po ston pa de thams cad ni bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:3b-14: sems can gang la la dag dge ba mngon par 'du bya ba byed pa de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:3b-19: don mthun pas bsdus pa sha stag ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:3b-20: de dag ni rgyu de nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:3b-21: dmigs pa de nyid kyis dge ba mngon par 'du byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:4a-0: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' de dag bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi ye shes chen po shin tu rgyas pa de thams @4a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:4a-2: rnam par blta zhing nye bar sems te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:4a-3: dge ba ji tsam mngon par 'du byed pa yang rgyu de nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:4a-4: dmigs pa de nyid kyis so; ;de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de dag ngo mtshar rmad du byung zhing ya mtshan gyis 'dun pa'i snying du gyur nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:4a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab bo snyam ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:4a-6: cang mi smra bar gyur nas bcom ldan 'das nyid la rnam par blta zhing nye bar sems so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:4a-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ya mtshan gyis snying 'dun pa mkhyen nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:4a-8: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yang dag par bskul ba zhes bya ba'i 'od zer 'khor 'od zer stong phrag du ma mgur nas phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:4a-9: de byung nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku thams cad snang bar byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:4a-10: nam mkha'i khams rab 'byams dag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:4a-11: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho dag na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:4a-12: byang chub sems dpa' gang dag dbang dang ldan par gyur pa 'khod pa de dag la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:4a-13: thams cad mkhyen pa rdzogs sangs rgyas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:4a-14: bcom ldan rims nad bral ba de //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:4a-15: dbang sgyur rgyal po'i khang pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:4a-16: skyon kun rnam par spangs pa na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:4a-17: snying 'thad chen po seng ge'i khri //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:4b-0: dpag tshad sum @4b brgya yod pa la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:4b-1: padma'i snying po der bzhugs nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:4b-2: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bskor //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:4b-3: gnas der thub pa chen po yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:4b-4: bkod pa chen por gang sprul pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:4b-5: de dag gi ni grangs tshad dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:4b-6: dbyibs dang kha dog gang yin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:4b-7: de ni bskal pa grangs med du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:4b-8: bstan par nus pa ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:4b-9: de ru de la dpa' bo che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:4b-10: rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:4b-11: yid gnyis som nyi spangs pa po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:4b-12: dvogs pa gcod pa blta bar gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:4b-14: de nas 'od zer de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la bskul nas slar log ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:4b-15: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi mgur du rang gi gnas su zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:4b-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang mdzod spu nas yid bzhin gyi nor bu bkod pa'i mdzod kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i 'od zer sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag par bskul ba 'khor 'od zer brgya stong dang ldan pa phyung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:4b-17: de yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:4b-18: 'dren pa bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:4b-19: blta ba dang ni mchod pa bgyi ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:4b-20: sems can phan par bzhed pas chos brjod phyir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:4b-21: khyed cag thams cad ma shol de ring gshegs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:4b-22: zhes yang dag par ston to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:5a-1: dag yang slar log nas bcom ldan 'das kyi mdzod spu nyid du zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:5a-2: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag 'od zer des bskul ma thag tu rang rang gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:5a-4: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de la blta ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:5a-5: phyag bgyi ba'i slad du rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen por mchi na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:5a-6: rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po de ni 'jig rten gyi khams gang zhig na mchis /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:5a-7: gang du bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams de'i ming ni ci zhes bgyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:5a-8: de'i byang chub kyi snying po ni ci 'dra ba zhig lags zhes zhus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:5a-9: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:5a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:5a-11: rang rang gi byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bka' stsal pa; rigs kyi bu dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:5b-0: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams du ma nges @5b par ston pa dag yod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:5b-1: 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams re re nges par ston pa re re la yang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:5b-2: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mtshams sbyor ba nges par ston pa'i bkod pa rab 'byams du ma yod par khong du chud par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:5b-4: de la mtshams sbyor ba bkod pa rnams kyi tshad ni gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:5b-5: ri'i rgyal po ri rab bye ba phrag brgya dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:5b-6: rgya mtsho chen po bye ba phrag brgya dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:5b-8: nyi ma bye ba phrag brgya dag gang gi khongs su 'dus shing rjes su zhugs pa de stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:5b-9: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya gang gi khongs su 'dus shing rjes su zhugs pa de me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa dang ldan pa rab 'byams kyi mtshams sbyor ba rnams kyi khongs su 'dus shing rjes su zhugs par gcig go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:5b-10: me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa dang ldan pa rab 'byams kyi mtshams sbyor ba bye ba phrag brgya gang gi khongs su 'dus shing rjes su zhugs pa de me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa rab 'byams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud gcig go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:6a-0: me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa'i rgyud bye ba phrag brgya rnams gang gi khongs su 'dus shing rjes su zhugs @6a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:6a-1: pa me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud bar ma gcig go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:6a-2: 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams bar ma bkod pa'i rgyud bye ba phrag brgya gang gi khongs su 'dus shing rjes su zhugs pa de me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bkod pa gcig ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:6a-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad des sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yongs su sbyangs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:6a-5: 'jig rten gyi khams de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gcig po de nyid /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:6a-6: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de nyid yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:6a-7: sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis ni yongs su bskor /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:6a-10: yid kyis las ni shin tu 'das shing nam mkha' nyid byang chub kyi snying por byin gyis brlabs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:6a-11: 'jig rten gyi khams bar ma de na rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po na bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:6a-13: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de ni de 'dra ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:6a-17: ye shes kyi mtha' ni nged kyis bskal pa grangs med par yang rtogs par mi nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:6b-0: @6b nged kyang bcom ldan 'das de sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur pa na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la btsud de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:6b-1: nged ni bcom ldan 'das de la byas pa gzo ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:6b-2: byas pa shes pa sha stag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:6b-4: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:6b-5: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la sngon gyi spyad pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:6b-6: smon lam dag gi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor rgyun mi gcod pa nas brtsams te bstan pa gnas par mdzad pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:6b-7: theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i spyod pa rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:6b-8: ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par rig par bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:6b-9: ji tsam du byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i byin gyis brlabs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:6b-10: rdo rje'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor chen po las brtsams te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:6b-11: ngag sna tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor rgya chen pos 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas pa rab 'byams go bar mdzad par bzhed nas 'od zer gyi dra ba chen po 'di phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:6b-12: de nas shar phyogs na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen tog gis byang chub sems dpa' rin chen blo gros la rin po che rdo rje chen po'i snying po 'di byin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:6b-13: na ma: sa manta mu khe bhya: sarba ta th'a ga te bhya: sarba tha aa dza ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:7a-0: khyod rin po che rdo rje chen po'i @7a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:7a-1: snying po 'dis 'jig rten gyi khams der gnas par gyis shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:7a-2: de nas byang chub sems dpa' rin chen blo gros kyis snying po 'di blangs te 'jig rten gyi khams de nas mi snang bar gyur nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:7a-3: byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:7a-4: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad la mchod pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:7a-5: rin po che rdo rje chen po la snying po 'dis mchod pa'i sprin chen po sngon ma mthong ba mngon par sprul nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:7a-6: 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa ga la ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:7a-7: rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:7a-8: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:7a-9: rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po yang rin po che dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:7a-10: rdo rje me tog gi sprin chen pos mngon par bkab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:7a-11: de bzhin du bdug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:7a-22: rdo rje'i sprin chen po dag gis bkab bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:7a-23: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad ga la ba der yang song nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:7a-24: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:7b-0: @7b lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das la lan brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:7b-1: ji ltar 'ongs pa bzhin du shar phyogs nyid du gnas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:7b-3: rdo rje'i khang pa brtsegs pa chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:7b-4: rin po che'i rgyal po chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:7b-6: padma'i snying po'i seng+ge'i khri chen po dag mngon par sprul nas rin po che rdo rje chen po'i snying pos byin gyis brlabs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:7b-7: rin po che yi ge'i snying pos phyogs bcu rgyas par 'gengs shing 'dug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:7b-8: lho phyogs na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog kun tu rgyas pa'i rgyal po'i dbang pos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:7b-9: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la rdo rje chen po'i snying pos byin gyis brlabs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:7b-12: 'jig rten gyi khams me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa der /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:7b-13: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de la phyag bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:7b-14: blta ba dang; mchod pa'i phyir song shig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:7b-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas me tog kun tu rgyas pa'i rgyal po'i dbang pos rdo rje chen po'i snying po 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:7b-16: na ma:sa manta mu khe bhya: sarba ta th'a ga te bhya: sarba mah'a badzr'a gra ba ram h'um/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:8a-0: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas rdo rje @8a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:8a-1: mchog gi snying po 'di thob cing /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:13b-5: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad shin tu lham me /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:13b-9: rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral zhing nam mkha' ltar gzod ma nas zhi ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:13b-10: yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po chen po ltar bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa yang mthong nas ngo mtshar du gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:13b-11: sgra skad gcig tu tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:13b-12: rtog pa thams cad spangs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:13b-13: gdod nas zhi zhing ma skyes pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:13b-14: mgon po rmad byung dam pa 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:13b-15: ji ltar sa la snang zhig gu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:13b-16: sku yis 'phrin las mi mdzad la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:14a-2: sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:14a-3: shin tu dag pa'i shel dang 'dra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:14a-4: sku yis sems can thams cad la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:14a-5: sangs rgyas mdzad pa rnams mdzad kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:14a-6: sku la 'gyur ba mi mnga' ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:14a-7: thub pa de ni 'gyur mi mnga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:14a-8: gsung ni brag cha 'dra ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:14a-9: bstan du med cing gzugs med kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:14a-10: lha yi rnga chen ji bzhin du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:14a-11: 'gro ba thams cad tshim par mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:14a-12: thugs ni rlom sems bral ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:14a-13: de la yul ni mnga' ma lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:14a-14: yul rnams dang ni de bral yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:14a-15: sems can rnams kyi yul du gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:14a-16: gsung ni de bzhin sems can te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:14a-17: de bzhin sku dang de bzhin thugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:14a-18: mtshan nyid gcig dang rab ldan zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:14a-19: smra ba'i nang na mchog tu snang; ;skye ba med las grol ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:14a-20: de bzhin gshegs pa yod min pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:14a-21: gang dag skye ba med shes pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:14a-22: de dag 'dren pa rnam par shes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:14a-23: mgon po rtag tu mnyam gzhag cing; ;lus dang ngag dang yid bral yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:14a-24: rtag par lus ngag spyod yul du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:14a-25: thub pa rgyun du rab tu snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:14a-26: byang chub sems dpa' che ba nyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:14a-27: shin tu dka' ba byed pa dag /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:14a-28: sangs rgyas ye shes che 'bar ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:14a-30: de la mig ni mi snang zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:14a-31: rna ba dang ni sna yang min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:14a-32: lce dang lus dang yid kyang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:14b-0: do phyir de yi @14b yul ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:14b-1: gzugs min sgra yang ma yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:14b-2: dri dang ro dang reg ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:14b-3: dbang po ma yin rnam shes min //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:14b-4: thams cad du ni rtag tu zhi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:14b-5: yul can dang ni yul de dag ;rnam par brtags pas yod ma yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:14b-6: yul can yod pa ma yin pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:14b-7: yul rnams srid pa ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:14b-8: byis pas ji ltar brtags pa bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:14b-9: de ltar gang tshe yod min pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:14b-10: de tshe mgon po yod 'gyur te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:14b-11: rnam par ma brtags tshul du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:14b-12: de ni kun tu thams cad la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:14b-13: bsam pa ji bzhin rdzogs mdzad pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:14b-14: stong pa yid bzhin nor bu ltar; ;kun gyi mdun na bzhugs pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:14b-15: gzugs brnyan 'byung ba'i tshul gyis su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:14b-16: ting 'dzin dbang bsgyur rnams la ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:14b-17: lta smra 'bel gtam thams cad kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:14b-19: rnam par snang mdzad mgon mthong nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:14b-20: de tshe kun gyi ting 'dzin dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:14b-21: gzungs dang rig pa rnam par thar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:14b-22: bsam gyis mi khyab thams cad thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:14b-23: gzugs la dbang ni thob gyur cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:14b-24: sangs rgyas ye shes tshol byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:14b-25: bdag cag rnams ni thams cad kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:14b-26: phyogs bcu dag nas lhags pa yin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:14b-27: yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:14b-28: de ni gzugs kyi mchog yin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:14b-29: yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas dag par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:14b-30: de ni bdag cag thob par shog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:15a-0: de nas byang chub sems dpa' @15a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:15a-1: de dag gis tshigs su gcad pa de dag smras nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:15a-3: lus kyi sngon gyi mthar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:15a-4: phyi ma'i mtha' med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:15a-6: yid kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:15a-7: phyi ma'i mtha' med pas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sku dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:15a-9: thugs kyi sa gang yin pa la 'jug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:15a-11: ngo bo nyid yongs su shes pas lus kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:15a-12: phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:15a-13: de bzhin du ngo bo nyid yongs su shes pas dag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:15a-14: yid kyi sngon gyi mtha' dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:15a-15: phyi ma'i mtha' mi dmigs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:15a-16: lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:15a-17: gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:15a-18: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad kyis byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa de dag kyang mkhyen /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:15a-19: rgyal po dbang sgyur gyi khang pa chen po na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'khod pa dag kyang mkhyen nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:15a-20: ting nge 'dzin gang gi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:15b-0: sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams @15b cad du skad cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:15b-2: yud tsam cig la sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:15b-3: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mtha'i bar du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byin gyis rlob pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par snang ba bkod pa'i rgyan gyi snying po zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:15b-4: bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:15b-5: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:15b-6: 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:15b-7: 'jig rten gyi khams mtshams sbyor ba'i bkod pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:15b-8: 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:15b-9: 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gling bzhi pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:15b-10: stong thams cad dang; stong gnyis pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:15b-11: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi chos thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:15b-12: 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:15b-13: 'jig rten gyi khams gtan la phab pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:15b-14: me tog gi gzhi'i snying po'i rgyan bkod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:15b-15: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad bsam pa sna tshogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:15b-18: theg pa sna tshogs kyi tshul rnam par gnas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:16a-4: sems can sna tshogs dag la sgra dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:16a-5: tshig brjod pa rnam par gzhag pa sna tshogs rnams kyis sems dang po bskyed pa nas bzung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:16a-6: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mtha'i bar du sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa yang dag par ston cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:16a-7: rang gi gsung gi 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor las byung ba sangs rgyas kyi dbyangs bkod pa'i rgyun gyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po yang dag par byin gyis brlabs nas rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po don yod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:16a-8: bstan pa gnas par bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:16a-9: sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir dus kyi dbang gis skye ba rim gyis yongs su gzung bar byin gyis brlabs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:16a-10: rdo rje ye shes kyi dbang bskur ba chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:16a-11: rdo rje chen po'i snying po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:16a-12: rdo rje chen po'i 'od 'phro ba rgyas par 'gengs pa'i snang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:16a-13: theg pa chen po'i spyod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:16a-14: gsang sngags rnam par dag pa'i sogs rdo rje'i khor yug chen po'i dkyil 'khor du lag na rdo rje dbang chen po bskur ba mdzad pa mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:16b-0: de ltar bcom ldan 'das rnam @16b par snang mdzad spros pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir thams cad du spros pa med pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:16b-1: rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir rnam dar mi rtog pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:16b-2: ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'i phyir stong pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:16b-3: gdod ma nas dag pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:16b-4: skye ba dang bral ba'i phyir ma skyes pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:16b-5: bsam pa'i sa las shin tu 'das pa'i phyir bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:16b-6: yul dang bral ba'i phyir yul med pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:16b-7: tshig gi lam las shin tu 'das pa'i phyir brjod par bya ba ma yin pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:16b-8: rnam pa thams cad du sems can thams cad yang dag par 'du ba'i sa la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi yid bzhin gyi nor bu dang 'dra bar bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa thams cad rjes su mthun pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:16b-9: 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na gzugs brnyan gyi rnam par sems can thams cad kyi mdun na 'dug pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:16b-10: nor bu rin po che chen po rin thang med pa gos dri ma can gyis dkris pa lta bu ni 'di su'i yin /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:16b-11: 'di ci zhig ces sems can rnams kyis mi shes te ya mtshan ci zhig tu gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:16b-12: gang dag blo gros rnam par dag pa yid gnyis dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:16b-14: sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:16b-15: dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:16b-16: theg pa chen po'i gsang sngags dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:17a-1: pa'i tshul la byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:17a-2: rdo rje 'chang ba thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:17a-3: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis rnam par snang mdzad chen po'i rgyan gyi snying po'i 'od zer chen pos snang bar byas pa de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po la zhugs pa dag ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:17a-4: de dag ni gsang sngags kyi spyod pa'i tshul 'di mnyan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:17a-6: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po bri ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:17a-7: dngos grub chen po bsgrub par bya ba'i skal ba yod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:17a-8: de nas 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'dir bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa'i mtshan gyis gling bzhi pa bar ma'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'dzam bu'i gling du bdud pham par mdzad nas byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:17a-9: dga' ldan gyi gnas na gnas pa nas bzung ste mthar gyis spyod pa spyod cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:17a-10: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i mtha'i bar du byin gyis brlabs nas chos bstan to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:17a-11: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa de yang bstan pa rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:17a-14: spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:17a-15: sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:17b-1: byang chub sems dpa' ngan song thams cad spong ba la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams bsdus nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:17b-9: lto 'phye chen po la sogs te thams cad kyi mdun du rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po bris nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:17b-10: lag na rdo rje dbang chen po bskur bas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dbang bskur nas de nyid la bstan pa gtad do ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:17b-11: lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:17b-12: sngon gyi spyod pa yang dag par bsgrub pa'i gtam gyi tshul 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:17b-13: 'phags pa lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba'i rgyud chen po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:17b-15: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:17b-16: bcom ldan 'das grong khyer chen po dpal yon tan 'byung ba'i gnas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:17b-17: shing s'a la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi spyod pas rnam par rol pa'i rgyu mthun pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i nags tshal chen po mchog na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:17b-18: dge slong khri nyis stong lnga brgya'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:17b-19: thams cad kyang zag pa zad pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:18a-1: kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa sha stag la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:18a-3: tshe dang ldan par rab 'byor dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:18a-4: tshe dang ldan pa ba lang bdag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:18a-5: tshe dang ldan pa dbang chen dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:18a-6: tshe dang ldan pa nyin gung dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:18a-7: tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:18a-8: tshe dang ldan pa mood gal gyi bu chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:18a-9: tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:18a-10: tshe dang ldan pa nye dga' bo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:18a-11: tshe dang ldan pa bzang po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:18a-12: tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan 'dzin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:18a-13: tshe dang ldan pa ma 'gags pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:18a-14: tshe dang ldan pa ka pi la chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:18a-15: tshe dang ldan pa yul 'khor skyong dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:18a-16: tshe dang ldan pa ga ya 'od srung dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:18a-17: tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:18a-18: tshe dang ldan pa tshems can dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:18a-19: tshe dang ldan pa gsus po che dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:18a-20: tshe dang ldan pa mdzes dga' dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:18a-21: tshe dang ldan pa gyad bu nor dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:18a-22: tshe dang ldan pa seng ldeng nags pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:18a-23: tshe dang ldan pa bsod snyoms len bha ra dva dza dang; tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung spyod dbang po'i bu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:18a-24: tshe dang ldan pa nye sbyor dang /
