K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:28b-1: dpal byed dpal sdud dpal ldan pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:28b-2: bde bar gshegs pa'i sras tshur shog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:28b-3: sems can bzang po stobs po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:28b-4: rdo rje lta bu tshur shog cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:28b-5: sangs rgyas sras po 'jigs med pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:28b-6: stobs can rnams kyi mchog tshur shog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:28b-7: rtag tu srid ba gsum de yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:28b-8: snying dga' byed pa tshur shog cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:28b-9: yang dag lam ni ston byed pa; ;stobs bcur gnas pa tshur shog cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:28b-10: sems can dag pa rdzu 'phrul che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:28b-11: kun tu bzang po tshur shog cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:28b-12: kun tu mdzes pa tshur shog cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:28b-13: srid gsum dbang phyug tshur shog cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:28b-14: khyod ni gzugs bzang shin tu brgyan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:28b-15: glang po rna ba khyod tshur shog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:28b-16: sna tshogs gzugs can 'khrul med khyod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:28b-17: mthong na dga' ba tshur shog cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:28b-18: 'gro lding ba yi gzugs can tshur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:28b-19: tshur shog na da ku be ra //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:28b-20: rtag tu sna tshogs gos phreng 'chang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:28b-21: cod pan mgul pa tshur shog cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:28b-22: mi 'jigs thob pa tshur shog cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:28b-24: sangs rgyas sras po rdzu 'phrul che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:28b-25: phyi shol ma byed tshur shog cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:28b-26: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sa tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:28b-27: 'ong ba la 'jigs pa med pa'i sgo'i rig sngags kyi rgyal po gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:29a-0: na ma: sarba mu khe bhya: sarba ta th'a ga te bhya: sarba th'a aa bisma ye bee sha ra dya mu khe bha ga ba ti badzra aa ma li @29a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:29a-1: ni m'a bi lam ba sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:29a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis mi 'jigs pa'i sgo'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di bka' stsal nas cang mi gsung bar bzhugs par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:29a-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'dis bskul bas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:29a-4: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos gnod sbyin gyi tshogs thams cad la smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:29a-6: tshur shog bcom ldan 'das de la blta ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:29a-8: bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' du ma'i tshogs kyis ni bskor /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:29a-9: nyan thos brgya stong du mas ni bskor /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:29a-19: mi ma yin pa bye ba stong phrag du mas ni yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:29a-20: shing s'a la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:29a-21: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa bzhugs pa ga la ba der dong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:29a-22: de nas gnod sbyin gyi tshogs de dag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:29a-23: gnod sbyin gzhon du rnams kyis mgrin gcig tu tshig smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:29b-0: bka' stsal pa bzhin du bcom ldan 'das @29b sh'akya thub pa de la blta ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:29b-3: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la blta ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:29b-5: bsnyen bkur bgyi ba'i slad du shing s'a la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba der bzhud do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:29b-6: de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos de'i tshe rgyan sna tshogs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin spyod pa thams cad kyi rgyu mthun pa ston pa la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:29b-7: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyan bkod pa'i khang ba brtsegs pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams tsam du yangs shing rgya che ba nor bu chen po'i ka ba bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma zug pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:29b-10: stegs bu du mas brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:29b-11: 'dzam bu chu bo'i gser las shing s'a la gcig pa lta bur byas pas rnam par spras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:29b-12: mtha' mthar phug ron lta bu'i phreng gis mdzes par byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:29b-13: mu tig sna gnyis kyi dra bas bres pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:29b-14: rin po che'i dril bu g-yer ka'i dra bas steng gi bar snang yongs su bskor ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:29b-16: dar gyi lda ldi mang po bres pas mdzes par byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:30a-1: pa snyan cing yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:30a-2: lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong glu len gar byed rol mo byed cing snyan par smra la gdu bu dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:30a-3: rna cha gdub 'khor gyis brgyan cing lha'i lus dang ldan pa rnams kyis gang ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:30a-4: rin po che chen po'i bra re kun tu bres pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:30a-5: phyogs bee d'urya chen pos legs par spras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:30a-6: ka tsa li di ka ltar reg na bde ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:30a-7: dus thams cad pa'i me tog gi shing ljon pas legs par brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:30a-8: lha'i rin po che'i thim skas kyi phreng gis rnam par spras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:30a-17: bya'i tshogs du ma sgra 'byin ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:30a-18: lha'i me tog aupta la dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:30a-24: yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus gang ba'i rdzing byang chub sems dpa' yongs su spyad par bya ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:30a-25: lha'i tsandan sbrul gyi snying po'i rdzab kyi rnyog ma can dag gis kun nas mdzes par byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:30a-26: rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par khang pa brtsegs pa der lha'i me tog man d'a ra ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:30a-28: pa ru sha ka chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:30a-30: sa brtol chen po'i me tog gi char mngon par 'bab pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:30b-0: aa ga ru nag po'i bdug @30b pa'i sprin mang pos khebs pas rnam par mdzes pa byung bar gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:30b-1: khang pa brtsegs pa de'i nang du byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi so so'i gnas bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du las kyis bskyed pa de dag mngon par sprul to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:30b-2: khang pa brtsegs pa de dag re re la yang rin po che dbang gi rgyal po la sogs pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu bcu drug rin po che'i rgyal po la sogs pas ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du yongs su spyad par bya ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:30b-3: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i nor pu rin po che chen po dag bkod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:30b-4: rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyan bkod pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa thams cad la rgyan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:30b-6: bdan sgreng bas mdzes par byas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:30b-7: khang pa brtsegs pa de dag tu yang padma'i snying po'i seng+ge'i khri rnams sprul to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:30b-8: khang pa brtsegs pa thams cad kyang be d'urya chen po gsal ba'i rang bzhin can te; 'di lta ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:30b-10: shin tu phyis pa'i me long ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyan bkod pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa yang rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag cing gsal ba ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:30b-11: bee d'urya gsal ba'i phyir der stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams cad gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du snang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:31a-0: dbus su ni bcom ldan 'das kyi @31a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:31a-1: seng+ge'i khri 'gro ba thams cad kyi bkod pa'i snying po rin po che chen po'i rgyal po las byas pa mngon par sprul to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:31a-2: sems can thams cad nye bar 'chi ba'i yo byad kyi sprin dag khang pa brtsegs pa der kun nas rtag tu babs par mngon par sprul te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:31a-3: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sngon gyi spyod pa rgya mtsho spyad pa'i phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:31a-4: de ltar bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir mngon par sprul nas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:31a-7: chos mnyan pa'i phyir gnod sbyin gyi tshogs chen po dang lhan cig tu gnod sbyin gzhon nu bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang pos yongs su bskor cing mdun du bdar nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:31a-8: byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:31a-9: byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos khang pa brtsegs pa de lag pa gnyis kas blangs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:31a-10: steng gi bar snang las babs te shing s'a la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:31a-11: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa ga la ba der song ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:31b-0: khang ba brtsegs pa de'i 'od kyis shing s'a la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i @31b nags tshal stug po 'di thams cad snang ba chen pos snang bar gyur nas gang dag 'khor der 'dus shing 'khod pa'i lha dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:31b-7: mi ma yin pa de dag snang ba des snang bar byas pas phyogs bzhir rnam par bltas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:31b-8: steng gi bar snang la dpag tshad 'bum phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad na me'i phung po chen po ltar 'bar ba'i nyi ma stong ltar lham mer rnam par mdzes par mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:31b-9: mthong nas kyang ya mtshan du gyur pa'i snying gis phan tshun rnam par bltas nas cang mi smra bar 'khod par gyur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:31b-10: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gzungs thob pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:31b-12: stobs thob pa de dag gis kyang rnam par bltas na me'i phung po chen po ltar 'bar ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:31b-13: nyi ma stong ltar lha ma mer rnam par mdzes pa mthong nas de dag kyang ya mtshan du gyur pa'i snying gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa la zhus pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:31b-15: 'di nas dpag tshad 'bum phrag drug cu rzta brgyad kyi steng gi bar snang la lham me /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:31b-19: rtogs par dka' la brjod par dka' ba 'di ci lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:32a-2: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pas byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:32a-3: lha'i 'khor chen po de la bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:32a-5: 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba de nga la blta ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:32a-10: nga la mchod pa'i phyir rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyan bkod pa zhes bya ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa mngon par sprul pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:32a-11: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyod pa bstan pa'i cho 'phrul sngon gyi spyod pa bsgrub pa'i rgyu mthun pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:32a-12: 'di ni chos gang gi yon tan bskal pa brgyar yang mtha' rtogs par mi nus pa de'i 'od lha ma me /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:32a-15: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po de yang theg pa chen po la 'jug pa'i sgo rnam par dag pa'i gnas zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kun tu 'dri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:32b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshig gi lan 'di bka' stsal ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po shing ta la bdun srid tsam @32b gyi steng gi bar snang la 'dug nas shing s'a la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po thams cad du lha'i me tog dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:32b-10: pheg rdob pa'i sprin mngon par sprul te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:32b-11: char du phab nas steng gi nam mkha' las babs te khang pa brtsegs pa de bcom ldan 'das la phul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:32b-12: phul nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:32b-13: sku dang gsung dang thugs mkhyen pas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:32b-14: rnam dag brtul zhugs bzang po pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:32b-15: rtog pa kun gyis rnam dag pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:32b-16: phyag 'tshal sems can dag khyod la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:32b-17: mig dang de bzhin rna ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:32b-18: sna dang de bzhin lce dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:32b-19: lus dang de bzhin yid kyang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:32b-20: smra ba'i mchog la bdag phyag 'tshal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:32b-21: gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:32b-22: reg bya yul can btsal ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:32b-23: dngos po kun las rnam grol ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:32b-24: rgyal ba mchog la phyag 'tshal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:32b-25: gzod nas zhi zhing ma skyes pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:32b-26: sku gsung thugs la sogs pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:32b-27: gzugs brnyan lta bur 'jig rten du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:32b-28: mnga' bdag khyod ni rtag tu dga'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:32b-29: khyod ni sems can srog ma lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:32b-30: gang zag kun gzhi khyod ma lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:32b-31: dus dang rang bzhin las ma byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:33a-1: ltar ma lags ci ma lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:33a-2: khyod ni brten nas byung ba tsam //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:33a-3: sgyu ma lta bur dngos po spangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:33a-4: chos rnams sgyu ma lta bur ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:33a-5: thugs su khyod chud rkang gnyis mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:33a-6: khyod ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:33a-7: stong pa nyid kyang mchis ma lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:33a-8: stong dang mi stong rnam par grol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:33a-10: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod nas g-yog 'khor dang lhan cig tu bcom ldan 'das la brgya stong du mar bskor ba byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:33a-11: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:33a-12: bcom ldan 'das la blta zhing phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:33a-13: de nas khang pa brtsegs pa de dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:33a-16: pheg rdob pa de dag las theg pa chen po'i thog ma'i spyod pa'i sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:33a-17: gzod nas zhi zhing mtshan nyid med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:33a-18: chos nyid gcig tu dag pa ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:33a-19: khyed cag the tshom dvogs spongs la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:33a-20: kye ma'o 'di la brtson par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:33a-21: theg pa chen po'i gnas 'di ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:33a-22: sngon gyi spyod pa bla na med //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:33a-23: spyod pa'i rgyal po bskyed che ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:33a-24: kun gyis shin tu thob par gyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:33a-25: sngon gyi spyod pa rgya mtsho rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:33b-0: yongs su @33b dag pa'i rgyu yis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:33b-1: rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzad ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:33b-2: rtag tu 'di na mdzes la ltos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:33b-3: ston pa gang du'ang mi gnas la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:33b-4: gang du'ang spyod par mi gnas kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:33b-5: gang dag spyod pa rnam sbyangs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:33b-6: de dag kun la gnas par gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:33b-7: 'gro ba'i mnga' bdag mig dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:33b-8: rna ba de bzhin sna dang ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:33b-9: lce dang de bzhin lus dang yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:33b-10: yid du snang ba ma lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:33b-11: dang po 'byung ba'i spyod pa ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:33b-12: gang gi tshe na sbyangs gyur pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:33b-13: de tshe bcom ldan rnam snang mdzad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:33b-14: rnal 'byor can gyis rtag tu mthong //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:33b-15: ring ba ma lags nye ma lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:33b-16: nang dang phyi ni ma lags te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:33b-17: rtag tu nam mkha' 'drar gnas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:33b-18: rnal 'byor pa ni chen po snang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:33b-19: de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos tshigs su bcad pa de dag brjod ma thag tu stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:33b-20: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:33b-21: gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:33b-22: bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phye na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:33b-23: bdag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:34a-2: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:34a-6: ngas dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:34a-7: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:34a-8: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:34a-11: theg pa chen po la 'jug pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:34a-12: theg pa chen po la 'jug pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni chos gang gi tshig bla dvags lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:34a-13: theg pa chen po la 'jug pa de'i spyod pa ni ji lta bu zhig lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:34a-14: spyod pa de rtogs par khong du chud pa ni su zhig lags /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:34a-15: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:34a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la legs so zhes bya ba byin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:34a-21: khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la don 'di 'dri ba yang legs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:34a-22: de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig ngas theg pa chen po la 'jug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:34a-23: theg pa chen po la 'jug pa'i gnas bshad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:34b-0: de la theg pa chen po zhes @34b bya ba 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos nyid kyi tshig bla dvags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:34b-1: de'i 'jug pa ni byang chub po //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:34b-3: gnas zhes bya ba ni gzhi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:34b-4: de yang snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro ba'i spyod pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:34b-5: sems can thams cad 'dul ba'i dbang nye bar bzung nas yul dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:34b-6: dus kyi dbang gis de'i rnam pa ston pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:34b-8: gzhan yang theg pa chen po ni rnam pa gnyis te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:34b-9: 'dus byas kyis rab tu phye ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:34b-10: 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:34b-11: de la 'dus byas kyis rab tu phye ba ni spyod pa'i ngo bo'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:34b-12: 'dus ma byas kyis rab tu phye ba'i theg pa chen po nyid ni theg pa chen po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:34b-14: gzhan yang 'dus byas ni rkyen gyis bskyed pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:34b-15: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:34b-17: 'dus ma byas ni mi skye ba'i chos nyid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:34b-18: stong pa nyid kyi rang gi ngo bo'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:34b-20: gzhan yang spyod pa'i ngo bo'i theg pa chen po gang zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:34b-21: stong pa nyid mngon du byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yul dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:34b-22: dus kyi dbang gis sems can 'dul ba'i dbang nye bar bzung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:34b-24: las kyis kun tu bslang ba'i tshul gyis 'dogs pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:34b-26: 'di ni spyod pa'i ngo bo'i theg pa chen po'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:35a-0: de la 'dus ma byas kyi theg pa chen @35a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:35a-3: ji ltar gnas pa'i chos nyid kyi tshig bla dvags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:35a-5: ji ltar gnas pa'i chos nyid ces bya ba 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid kyi chig bla dvags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:35a-6: bsam gyis ma khyab pa'i chos nyid gang yin pa de ni 'dus ma byas pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:35a-7: 'dus ma byas gang yin pa de ni mtha' gnyis la mi ltos pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:35a-8: de la gdags pa'i ngo bo nyid med cing mi gdags pa'i ngo bo nyid kyang yang med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:35a-9: gang la gdags pa'i ngo bo med cing mi gdags pa'i ngo bo med pa de la spyod pa med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:35a-10: gang la spyod pa med pa de brjod par bya ba ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:35a-11: gang brjod par bya ba ma yin pa de dngos po thams cad dang bral ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:35a-12: gang dngos po thams cad dang bral ba de mi 'khrugs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:35a-13: gang mi 'khrugs pa de chos so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:35a-14: chos gang yin pa de de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:35a-15: gang de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de bden pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:35a-17: bden pa gang yin pa de yod pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:35a-18: yod pa gang yin pa de brdzun ma yin pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:35a-19: gang brdzun ma yin pa de yang dag ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:35a-20: yang dag pa gang yin pa de ni chos nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:35a-21: chos nyid gang yin pa de mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:35b-0: gang mi rtog rnam par mi rtog pa de ye @35b shes so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:35b-1: ye shes gang yin pa de rnam par shes pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:35b-2: rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de de bzhin nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:35b-3: de bzhin nyid gang yin pa de ni btags pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:35b-4: btags pa gang yin pa de ni rtog pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:35b-5: rtog pa gang yin pa de kun rdzob ces bstan te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:35b-6: kun rdzob yod pas spyod pa btags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:35b-7: btags pa yod pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten du 'byung ba ston to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:35b-8: sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bdud bzhi pham par byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:35b-9: chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:35b-10: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po la thug pa'i bar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:35b-18: rgud pa 'jig rten du kun tu ston to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:35b-20: de la sogs pa dus dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:35b-21: yul gyi dbang nye bar bzung nas spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor bcas te thabs sna tshogs kyi tshul rnams kyis sems can rnams la chos ston to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:35b-22: chos bstan pa de ni yang dag pa'i phul yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:35b-23: theg pa gcig tu yang dag par 'du ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:35b-24: yul gcig yang dag par thob par byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:35b-26: de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtog pa thams cad dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:35b-28: chos nyid gang yin pa de la ni gdags pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:36a-0: rnam par rig pa med cing mi @36a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:36a-1: dmigs te ye shes rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:36a-2: de la ni spyod pa yang med /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:36a-5: bslab pa ma yin pa yang med; 'dul ba yang med /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:36a-6: 'dul ba ma yin pa yang med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:36a-13: byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:36a-15: rang sangs rgyas zhes bya ba 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:36a-27: mi ma yin pa zhes bya ba'i bar ram /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:36a-32: mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:36a-34: thar pa zhes bya ba med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:36a-36: de la ni dus zhes bya ba 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:36a-40: thang cig ces bya ba med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:36a-41: de la ni zla ba zhes bya ba 'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:36b-7: zla ba zhes bya ba med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:36b-9: de ltar na rtog pas brtags pa'i sgo 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyi mthar ltung ba ji snyed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:36b-10: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i brtags pa'i sgo ji snyed pa de dag thams cad na de la mi 'gyur zhing med de mi dmigs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:36b-12: chos nyid de gnyis su med pa'i mtshan nyid yin pa'i phyir te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:36b-13: de la gnyis su mi 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:36b-17: nam mkha' gnyis pa ma skyes pa'i phyir nam mkha'i khams ni gnyis su med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:36b-19: de bzhin du chos nyid kyang gnyis su med pa'o; ;rigs kyi bu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:36b-20: de ltar na gang chos nyid 'di lta bu la spyod pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:36b-21: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis spyad pa spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams su bstan to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:36b-23: spyod pa ma yin pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:36b-24: bslab pa ma yin pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i bslab pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:36b-25: thob pa med pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thob pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:36b-26: rtsom pa med pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rtsom pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:37a-2: gdags su med pa ni 'dogs pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:37a-3: mthong ba med pa ni sangs rgyas mthong ba'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:37a-4: bsnyen bkur mi byed pa ni dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:37a-5: mi nyan pa ni chos nyan pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:37a-6: khong du chud pa med pa ni khong du chud pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:37a-8: gnas pa med pa ni gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:37a-9: stong pa nyid ma yin pa ni stong pa nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:37a-10: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni shes pa med pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:37a-12: mngon par rtogs pa med pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:37a-13: mngon sum du byed pa med pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:37a-15: rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar rig par bya ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:37a-16: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni spyod pa spyad pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:37a-17: gang du yang mi chags pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:37a-18: gang du yang rjes su chags pa med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:37a-19: gang du yang khong khro ba med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:37a-20: gang du yang zhe sdang ba med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:37a-23: phyin ci ma log pas rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:37a-24: rnam par mi rtog pa; zhi ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:37a-32: sems can gyi don bya ba la yongs su mi skyo ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:37a-33: dus gsum yang sgyid lug pa med pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:37a-37: nam mkha'i khams ni rdul lam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:37b-0: sprin gyis kun nas nyon mongs par @37b mi 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:37b-3: nam mkha'i khams rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:37b-5: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa 'di lta bu spyad pa yang sgyid lug par mi 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:37b-6: kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:37b-8: de la spyod pa 'di lta bu la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje chen po'i dkyil 'khor bkod pa'i rgyan rdo rje chen po'i rtog gi spyod pa rdo rje chen po las 'byung ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:37b-9: de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pas bsod nams la sogs pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs gzung bar bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:37b-11: gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par bshad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:37b-12: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:37b-13: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:37b-18: chos kyi rnam grangs 'di dag gang dag gi rna lam du grags par gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa lags na gang dag nyan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:37b-21: yid la bgyid pa dag lta smos kyang ci 'tshal te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:37b-23: de dag ni theg pa chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges pa lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:38a-1: pa chen po bla na med pa de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa rnam par 'phrul ba'i gnas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshul la skal ba mchis pa lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:38a-2: bdag la thugs brtse bar dgongs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:38a-3: bcom ldan 'das kyis theg pa chen po bla na med pa 'phral du 'bras bu mang ba bshad du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:38a-4: de skad ces gsol ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:38a-5: bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar bzhugs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:38a-6: rdo rje chen po 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so; ;bcom ldan 'das kyis mnyam par gzhag ma thag tu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:38a-7: de nas de'i mod la phyogs thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje chen po'i sgra sgrogs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:38a-8: gsung gcig tu rdo rje chen po 'bar ba'i 'od 'phro ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i 'byung gnas rdo rje sems dpa'i yi ge brjod cing shing s'a la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags tshal stug po ga la ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:38a-9: bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa ga la ba der gshegs te byon nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:38a-10: rdo rje chen po padma'i gdan la skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:38b-0: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis bcom ldan 'das sh'akya thub pa la gnod pa chung ngam zhes bsnyun @38b gsol te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:38b-5: bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes bsnyun gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:38b-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:38b-7: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad slod nas rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa'i rdo rje gsang sngags kyi rgyal po 'di gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:38b-8: na ma:sarba mu khe bhya:sarba ta th'a ga te bhya:sarba th'a aom badzra ka ra kham sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:38b-9: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po'i dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa'i gsang sngags gsungs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:38b-10: sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis rnam par 'phrul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:38b-11: de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor chen po de ya mtshan du che'o snyam du snying 'dun par gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:38b-12: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la blta zhing 'khod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:38b-13: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'khor de ya mtshan che snyam du rtse gcig tu gyur par rig nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:38b-14: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:38b-15: phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'dus pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la zhus pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:38b-16: gsang sngags rgyal po bka' stsal nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:39a-2: bde gshegs sras la rdo rje yis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:39a-3: dbang bskur du ni nges par gda'//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:39a-4: gsang sngags spyod pa ye shes che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:39a-5: theg pa chen po'i go 'phang mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:39a-6: der ni thams cad mkhyen nyid dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:39a-7: don kun grub pa'i spyod pa thob //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:39a-8: gsang sngags spyod las byung ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:39a-9: theg pa chen po thams cad mkhyen //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:39a-10: sngon gyi rdzogs sangs rgyas rnams kyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:39a-11: nags tshal mchog 'dir rtag tu bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:39a-12: s'a la'i rgyal mtshan nyams dga' che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:39a-13: spyod pa yang dag bstan pa'i gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:39a-14: sngon gyi spyod las byung gyur pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:39a-15: gsang sngags shes las byung bar bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:39a-16: gang dag 'das pa'i rdzogs sangs rgyas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:39a-17: de bzhin gang dag ma byon dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:39a-18: mgon po gang dag da lta byung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:39a-19: rnam par 'dren pa bzhugs pa rnams //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:39a-20: de dag thams cad 'dir gshegs shing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:39a-21: gsang sngags spyod las byung ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:39a-22: theg pa chen po dbang bskur 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:39a-23: bde gshegs sras la rab tu stsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:39a-24: sangs rgyas drang srong chen po pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:39a-25: kun gyi dbang ni bdag lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:39a-27: rdzogs sangs rgyas la gsol ba 'tshal //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:39a-28: bstan pa kun la bsrung ba dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:39a-29: dam chos rtag gnas bgyi slad du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:39a-30: bdag nyid che ba'i spyi gtsug tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:39b-0: rdzogs sangs rgyas @39b kyi dbang bskur stsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:39b-1: gsang sngags spyod las byung ba yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:39b-2: theg chen rtogs par khong du chud //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:39b-3: sngon gyi smon lam nges byung ba //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:39b-4: sangs rgyas sras po grags chen lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:39b-5: thog ma'i spyod ldan nges pa 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:39b-7: bde gshegs sras po chags med pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:39b-8: byang chub mthar thug dbang thob lags //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:39b-9: gsang sngags mgon pos rnam kun tu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:39b-11: gsang sngags rgyal po bka' stsal nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:39b-12: ci slad mi gsung gyur cing bzhugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:39b-14: bde bar rtog la brtson par gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:39b-15: dpa' bo che rnams the tshom dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:39b-16: de bzhin yid gnyis bsal du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:39b-17: da ni dus la bab lags na //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:39b-18: phyi bshol ma mdzad bshad du gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:39b-19: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gsol ba btab par mkhyen nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:39b-20: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pas gsungs pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:39b-21: 'dren pa rnams kyis gang sangs rgyas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:39b-22: chos nyid 'di ni gcig tu mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:39b-23: rtag tu mnyam gzhag rnams kyis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:39b-24: rab tu bsgrims te de rtogs bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:40a-0: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sh'akya thub pa la sogs pas shing s'a la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan bkod pa'i nags @40a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:40a-1: tshal stug po kun tu rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi khyams bkod pa gru bzhi lham pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:40a-3: rin po che sna bdun gyi phyi ras bskor ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:40a-7: steng du rin po che'i bla re bres pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:40a-8: rin po che'i dril bu dpyangs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:40a-9: rin po che sna lnga'i srad bu bres par byin gyis brlabs te dbus su rdo rje padma'i khri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:40a-10: phyogs cha brgyad du rdo rje chen po'i phreng bas bskor ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:40a-11: rdo rje phyi ras kun tu bskor ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:40a-12: rdo rje'i phyi rgyab tu ni rdo rje'i phreng ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:40a-13: rdo rje'i srad bus bres pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:40a-14: rdo rje bcing bas bcings pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:40a-15: rdo rje'i phur bu dag gdab pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:40a-16: thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin can du byin gyis brlabs nas steng gi gtsug tor nas thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i stobs zhes bya ba'i 'od zer phyung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:40a-17: 'od zer de dag byung nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor la snang bar byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:40a-18: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i spyi gtsug tu zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:40a-19: de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer de dag zhugs ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po dga' zhing mgu nas rab tu dga' ste thogs pa med pa'i stobs zhes bya ba'i snying po smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:40b-0: @40b na ma:sarba ta th'a ga te bhyo bi shva mu khe bhya: sarba th'a aa pra ti ha ta ba la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:40b-1: mah'a badzra a'a dzny'a ka ra na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:40b-3: de nas thogs pa med pa'i stobs rdo rje'i snying po smras ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi ting nge 'dzin dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:40b-6: byang chub kyi yan lag dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:40b-9: stong pa nyid dang; sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:40b-10: stong pa nyid chen po'i mtha' las byas pa sbyin pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:40b-12: yang dag par sdom pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:40b-13: des ma la sogs pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis rnam par bskyed pa'i gzugs can gyi rdo rje byin gyis brlabs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:40b-14: byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i lag tu byin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:40b-15: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kun tu bzang po'i lag tu rdo rje byin ma thag tu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:40b-16: de nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:40b-17: sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:40b-18: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:40b-20: rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:40b-30: mi ma yin pa thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:41a-1: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni lag na rdo rje'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:41a-4: 'phags pa lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:41a-6: de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis dam tshig 'di byin gyis brlabs nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:41a-7: yang gsang ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:41a-8: na ma: sarba ta th'a ga te bhya: sarba mu khe bhya: sarba th'a gu hya badzra dha ra sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:41a-9: de nas gsang ba'i rdo rje'i snying po gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:41a-10: sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:41a-12: gsang ba'i bdag po zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags nas; 'di lta ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:41a-14: de bzhin gshegs ba thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi stobs kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:41a-15: ye shes phun sum tshogs pa dag mngon sum du zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:41a-16: yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis bstan pa kun tu bsrung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:41a-17: 'gro ba yongs su skyob pa'i snying po rdo rje chen po rgya che ba'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i snying po gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:41b-0: na ma: sarba ta th'a ga te bhya: sarba mu khe bhya: sarba th'a @41b badzra dha ra bi ra bi ra bi ki ra bi ki ra sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:41b-1: rdo rje chen po rgya che ba'i snying po gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:41b-2: sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du rdo rje chen po rgya che ba las byung ba'i lag na rdo rje sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:41b-3: 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:41b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:41b-5: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:41b-7: rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:41b-8: sems dang bo bskyed pa rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:41b-9: las dang po pa rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:41b-10: sems can rnams kyi rgyab dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:41b-15: byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:41b-16: sems can gyi don byed pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:41b-17: sprul pa rab tu byed pa'i bar du thams cad kyi drung na gzugs thams cad yang dag par ston pa'i cho ga shes pa lag na rdo rje cod pan du kun tu snang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:41b-18: yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis phyogs rdo rjes bcings pa zhes bya ba rdo rje'i snying po mchog gsungs pa; na ma: sarba ta th'a ga te bhya: sarba mu khe bhya: sarba th'a dig badzra ta ta ta ta tam sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:42a-0: phyogs rdo rjes bcings pa'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu phyogs bcu na sems can @42a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:42a-1: ma rungs pa thams cad rdo rje'i bcing bas bcings par snang ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:42a-2: de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis sa'i rdo rje'i phur bu zhes bya ba'i snying po gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:42a-3: na ma: sarba ta th'a ga te bhya: sarba mu khe bhya: sarba th'a tha tha tha tha tham sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:42a-4: sa rton gyi rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:42a-6: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di rdo rje'i sa rton to zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:42a-7: yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis sa 'og gi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i snying po mchog gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:42a-8: na ma: sarba ta th'a ga te bhya: sarba mu khe bhya: sarba th'a ya ta ya tam sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:42a-9: sa 'og gi rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:42a-10: sa'i 'og gi phrag thams cad du /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:42a-12: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni sa 'og gi rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:42a-13: yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi 'gro ba gcod pa zhes bya ba'i snying po gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:42a-14: na ma: sarba ta th'a ga te bhya: sarba mu be bhya: sarba th'a tsitshanda sarba b'i ry'antu ra ga de ma pra barma la bdha bi dza ye sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:42b-0: rig sngags 'chang gi @42b 'gro ba gcod pa'i snying po mchog 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:42b-1: rig sngags 'chang gi gnas thams cad du /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:42b-3: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni rig sngags 'chang gi 'gro ba gcod pa'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:42b-4: yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis gnod sbyin tshar gcod pa'i rdo rje chen po'i snying po gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:42b-5: na ma:sarba ta th'a ga te bhya:sarba mu khe bhya:sarba th'a badzra yaksha ni gri ha da ta sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:42b-6: gnod sbyin gyi rdo rje'i snying po gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:42b-7: gnod sbyin gyi gnas thams cad du /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:42b-9: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni gnod sbyin gyi rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:42b-10: yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis klu'i rdo rje bsgrags pa'i tog rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba'i snying po gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:42b-11: na ma:sarba ta th'a ga te bhya:sarba mu khe bhya:sarba th'a ha ra ha ra n'a ga badzra sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:42b-12: de nas klu'i rdo rje'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:43a-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni klu'i rdo rje zhes sgra @43a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:43a-1: gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:43a-2: yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po dri za'i snying po gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:43a-3: na ma:sarba ta th'a ga te bhya: sarba mu khe bhya:sarba th'a ma tha ma tha badzra gandharba hri da ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:43a-4: rdo rje chen po dri za'i snying po gsungs ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:43a-5: dri za'i gnas thams cad du /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:43a-7: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni dri za'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:43a-8: yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i snying po gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:43a-9: na ma:sarba ta th'a ga te bhya:sarba mu khe bhya: sarba th'a badzra pi ta ta dha ra ka ra ham ha sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:43a-10: de nas rdo rje chen po nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang; nam mkha' lding gi gnas thams cad du /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:43a-12: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje chen po 'di ni nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:43a-13: yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po mi 'am ci'i snying po gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:43b-0: na ma:sarba ta th'a ga te bhya: @43b sarba mu khe bhya:sarba th'a badzra kanni ra danda bi je ya shapta sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:43b-1: de nas mi'am ci'i snying po mchog 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:43b-2: mi 'am ci'i gnas thams cad du /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:43b-4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni mi'am ci'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:43b-5: yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje lto 'phye chen po'i snying po gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:43b-6: na ma:sarba ta th'a ga te bhya:sarba mu khe bhya:sarba th'a ma ho ra ga badzra dzv'a l'a ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:43b-7: de nas rdo rje lto 'phye chen po'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:43b-8: lto 'phye chen po'i gnas thams cad du /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:43b-10: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni lto 'phye chen po'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:43b-11: yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po srin po'i snying po 'di gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:43b-12: na ma:sarba ta th'a ga te bhya:sarba mu khe bhya:sarba th'a badzra raksha sa kr'u ra da ha pa tsa tum tum tum tum sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:43b-13: de nas rdo rje chen po srin po'i snying po 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:43b-14: srin po'i gnas thams cad du /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:44a-0: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje 'di ni srin @44a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:44a-1: po'i rdo rje'i zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:44a-2: yang de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis rdo rje chen po mkha' 'gro ma zhes bya ba'i snying po gsungs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:44a-3: na ma:sarba ta th'a ga ta bhya:sarba mu khe bhya:sarba th'a badzra hrid he ta sv'ah'a /
