K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:90a-3: lag na rdo rje'i snying ga nas kyang khro bo'i rgyal po 'jig pa'i me lce chen po zhes bya ba byung nas gad mo rta bgad chen po rgyas par 'byin cing thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi snying rnams yongs su bsdus nas nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa nyid du gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:90a-4: lag na rdo rje'i snying gi dkyil 'khor du zhugs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:90a-6: yang snying rje chen po'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:90a-7: de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid kyi gnas pas gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:90a-8: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis lag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba brjod de bka' stsal pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:90a-9: sngags kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:90a-10: snying po stobs chen ldan pa 'di //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:90a-11: bstan pa 'di ni srung byed cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:90a-12: thag pa chen po'i gnas 'di la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:90a-13: gdul dka' rtag tu 'dul ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:90a-14: dpa' bo chen po khyod kyis bshad //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:90a-15: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de 'khor lo chen po'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du 'gyel bar rig nas cher snying rje skyes te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:90a-16: mig gnyis kyis ring du bltas nas rdo rje mchog gi snying po dam pa sbyin pa chen po 'dis byin gyis brlabs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:90b-0: spyod @90b ba chen po mchog gi dkyil 'khor gyi phyir rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po la blta zhing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos rab dam pa la rnam par rgyal ba thob pa byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:90b-2: 'khor 'di la dam tshig la 'jug pa'i sgo cung zad cig stsol cig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:90b-3: des bstan pa 'di la srog gi re ba thob cing dad pa thob nas rang rang gi gsang sngags kyi snying po 'bul bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:90b-4: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:90b-5: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rjes 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la smras pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:90b-6: ting nge 'dzin la dbang thob cing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:90b-7: nam mkha' lta bur chags med la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:90b-8: kun tu sangs rgyas thams cad kyi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:90b-9: smon lam rtag tu rdzogs byed pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:90b-10: gsang sngags kun gyi spyod pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:90b-11: de bzhin gsang sngags bsgrub pa dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:90b-12: brtul zhugs dang ni rtags dang gzugs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:90b-13: dus dang yul dang cho ga shod //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:90b-14: de'i tshe rdo rje de rdo rje mchog gi stobs kyi gzungs dang lhan cig tu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la byin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:90b-15: na ma:sarba ta th'a ga te bhya:sarba mu khe bhya:sarba th'a ae hi mah'a badzra ko ti ku ti la p'a bag aam ku la she khe ka pi la ke shr'i ta ti ta ti /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:90b-17: karkka ti mu ti mah'a thin dud lo lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:90b-21: bi sa ra bi sa ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:91a-1: ri pim ga le; tsa ti bi tsa ti /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:91a-4: badzra sa ra dhrishta pra ha ra ne /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:91a-8: badzra dha ra b'i sh'a sa ma /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:91a-9: aa pra ti ha ta pra marda ni sv'ah'a //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:91a-10: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'khor de la smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:91a-12: rig pa'i rgyal mo rdo rje mi pham pa mes rab tu rmongs byed 'di dran par gyis shig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:91a-15: srog thob par byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:91a-16: lag na rdo rjes rig pa chen po 'di smras ma thag tu /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:91a-17: de nas dam pa sbyin pa'i rdo rjes 'khor de byin gyis brlabs nas mgrin gcig tu tshig smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:91a-19: bcom ldan 'das mi pham pa mes rab tu rmongs byed de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes smras te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:91a-20: skad cig de nyid la 'khor de langs nas kun tu bzang po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:91a-21: byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:91a-22: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la blta zhing tshig 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:91a-23: kye ma ye shes kye ma skyid //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:91a-24: kye ma sngags shes bsam mi khyab //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:91a-25: des ni bdag cag thams cad kyang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:91a-26: mgon dang bsam gtan dga' dang ldan //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:91a-27: sems zhi tshegs ni ma mchis par //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:91a-28: sangs rgyas bstan pa lhur len 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:91a-29: sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:91b-0: bdag cag @91b thams cad mchis nas su //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:91b-1: cho ga'i rgyal po tshul chen 'dir //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:91b-2: snying po dag ni da dbul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:91b-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshangs pas 'di skad ces gsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:91b-5: bdag kyang lag na rdo rjes dbang chen po bskur ba'i dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba mang po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:91b-6: na ma:sarba ta th'a ga te bhya:sarba mu khe bhya:sarba th'a aom/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:91b-8: 'di ni bdag gi snying po'i mchog lags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:91b-9: rig byed bzhi rab tu brjod pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:91b-11: dbyangs dang ldan pa'i bkod pa chen po 'god pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:91b-15: mchod sbyin la sogs pa'i las rnams 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:91b-16: rgya mtsho chen po bzhin du chos thams cad kyi gzhir gyur pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:91b-17: lag na rdo rjes smras pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:91b-18: rdo rje sems dpa' rdo rje che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:91b-19: rdo rje aom zhes bya ba ste //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:91b-20: byams dang ting nge 'dzin las skyes //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:91b-21: nga rgyal rnam par sbyangs pa legs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:91b-22: de nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:91b-24: bdag gi snying po rgyal srid thams cad la dbang sbyin par bgyid pa 'di bzhes su gsol //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:91b-25: na ma:sarba ta th'a ga te bhya:sarba mu khe bhya:sarba th'a bi da r'a ya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:92a-2: snying po 'dis bdag lha rnams kyi bdag po bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:92a-4: gang la la zhig rdo rje 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir zhugs par gyur pa der bdag gi snying po 'di bsgrub par 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:92a-5: des dang por lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:92a-6: tha mar thang shing gi yam sreg shing mar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:92a-7: sbrang rtsi dang lhan cig tu lan khri sbyin sreg bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:92a-9: bdag gis de thams cad bsgrub par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:92a-10: shi 'phos nas kyang mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:92a-11: rtag tu bzlas brjod bgyis na rgyas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:92a-12: lag na rdo rje la blta zhing zas mi 'tshal bar lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyis na rgyal srid 'thob ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:92a-13: dam tshig nyams pa ni ma gtogs te mi 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:92a-14: de nas klu'i rgyal po de dag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:92a-17: des na bdag cag thams cad dbang du mchi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:92a-21: na ma: sarba ta th'a ga te bhya:sarba mu khe bhya:sarba th'a re re r'a tim n'a ga le li ri /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:92a-24: snying po 'di'i bsgrub pa lags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:92a-25: rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung ngam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:92b-0: mtsho @92b chen por zhugs te lan khri bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:92b-1: de nas klu gang yang rung ba mngon du phyogs te mchi bar mthong ngam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:92b-2: mtsho 'khrugs kyang de la 'jigs par ma bgyis na 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:92b-3: tha mar seng ldeng gi yam sreg shing yungs kar gyi 'bru mar las smyugs pas lan khri bzlas brjod bgyis te de lta na yang 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:92b-5: mi 'gro ba'i dug rnams kyang bsam pa tsam gyis sel bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:92b-6: sgrub pa po'i las rnam pa sna tshogs gzhan yang bsam pa tsam gyis bgyid par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:92b-7: de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rnam thos kyi bus byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:92b-9: bdag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po rim par phye ba mang po 'dir sgrub pa po rnams kyi phun sum tshogs pa thams cad stsol bar bgyid pa'i rang gi snying po 'di 'bul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:92b-10: na ma:sarba ta th'a ga te bhya:sarba mu khe bhya:sarba th'a yaksha sha ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:92b-12: sa ma ya ma nu sma ra /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:92b-13: de bhi mi bee shra ba na pri ya sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:92b-15: gang la la zhig snying po 'di bsgrub pa des ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du gcig pu mchis te snying po 'di lan lnga 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:92b-16: tha mar ci 'byor pas mchod pa bgyis la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:93a-0: mtshan thog thag tu til nag po @93a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:93a-3: mar dang bsres pas lan sum khri sbyin sreg bgyis na gang 'tshal ba de stsol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:93a-4: zas mi 'tshal bar lkog tu dben par gnod sbyin mo yid la bgyis te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:93a-5: nyin zhag bdun du lan khri bzlas brjod bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:93a-6: gnod sbyin mo stsol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:93a-7: lo gcig gi bar du nyin re zhing dran par bgyis na gter cig stsol bar bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:93a-8: de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po 'phrog gnas kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:93a-9: bdag kyang dkyil 'khor rim par phye ba mang po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:93a-10: na ma:sarba ta th'a ga te bhya:sarba mu khe bhya:sarba th'a khi mi si ri smra shi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:93a-11: pa ri p'u ra yan pra ti dzny'a manta ke sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:93a-13: gang la la zhig bdag gi snying po 'di rtag tu dran par bgyid na de'i slad bzhin du bdag rtag tu 'brang bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:93a-14: ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na des ri'i rtse mor mchis la lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi zhing yungs kar dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:93a-17: mar bsres pas lan 'bum sbyin sreg bgyis na gang 'tshal ba de stsol to; ;de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yul 'khor srung gis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:93b-0: bdag kyang @93b dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'di 'bul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:93b-1: na ma:sarba ta th'a ga te skya:sarba mu khe bhya:sarba th'a bi dha ra dha ri /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:93b-4: gang la la zhig snying po 'di dran par bgyid pa de la dus ma lags par 'gum pa mi 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:93b-5: rtag tu dpal gyis 'khor bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:93b-6: ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal ba des zla ba tshes nas bzung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:93b-7: nya'i bar du nyin gcig bzhin me tog gi sreg blugs lan khri sbyin sreg bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:93b-8: de nas nya'i gdugs la ci 'byor pas mchod pa bgyis la mtshan thog thag 'bras kyi'o thug sbyin sreg bgyis na grub par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:93b-10: de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po mig mi bzang gis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:93b-12: bdag kyang bsam pa thams cad yongs su bskang ba'i slad du dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:93b-13: na ma: sarba ta th'a ga te bhya:sarba mu khe bhya:sarba th'a shr'i dhi dha ra ya bi r'u p'aksha sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:93b-16: rigs kyi bu mo gang la la bdag gi snying po 'di rtag tu dran par bgyid pa de'i slad bzhin bdag rtag tu 'brang bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:93b-17: bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:94a-0: ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na des ri'i rtse mor @94a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:94a-1: mchis la lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:94a-2: de nas nya'i gdugs la ci 'byor pas mchod pa bgyis la mtshan thog thag tu gu gul shing gi yam sreg sbrang rtsi dang mar la smyugs pa khri sbyin sreg bgyis na 'grub par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:94a-4: ma grub na yang yul gru bzang po lnga stsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:94a-5: de nas chu dbang rmugs byed 'dzin gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:94a-7: bdag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir sgrub pa po rnams kyi don thams cad grub pa snying po mchog 'bul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:94a-8: na ma:sarba ta th'a ga te bhya:sarba mu khe bhya:sarba th'a ku ru tsu ru mu ru dzambha dza lod bha ba sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:94a-10: gang la la zhig bdag gi snying po 'di rtag tu bzlas brjod bgyis pa de la ci 'tshal ba de bsgrub par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:94a-11: ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na nyi ma 'gyur ba'i tshe ri'i rtse mor mchis la lan sa ya bzlas brjod bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:94a-14: gi wang la lan gcig sngags te mig la bskus na gang bltas pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:94a-15: mtshan mo gdong la sngags te bsam nas nyal na ci bsams pa de rmi lam du mthong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:94a-16: gos 'dod na me tog kha dog ci 'dra ba chur bor ba kha dog de 'dra ba'i gos de dag rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:94b-0: @94b phyugs chung 'dod na zhag bdun gsum du nyi ma'i gzugs brnyan la sngags lan gcig btab pa'i me tog phog par bor na rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:94b-1: rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na dpal che bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:94b-2: de nas lag brgyad pas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:94b-5: 'dod pa thams cad yongs su bskad pa'i slad du bdag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po mang po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:94b-6: na ma:sarba ta th'a ga te bhya:sarba mu khe bhya:sarba th'a tsakra dva dva ba hu r'a dza sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:94b-8: gang la la zhig bdag gi snying po 'di bsgrub par bgyid pa des bsgrub pa bgyis la skyed mos tshal gyi phyogs gtsang mar shing mya ngan 'tshang gi 'og tu lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:94b-9: tha mar gzhon nu la ci 'byor pas mchod de mtshan thog thag aa ga ru'i bdug pa bsregs la bzlas brjod bgyis na nam phyed dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:94b-10: nang par de la bdag bstan par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:94b-11: dam pa gang 'tshal ba stsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:94b-12: zas mi za bar lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyis na de nyid du gnod sbyin mo mchi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:94b-14: ci ste mi mchin 'gum par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:94b-15: de nas gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lnga rtsen gyis btud nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:95a-2: bdag kyang sgrub pa po gsang sngags bsgrub pa la brtson pa rnams la bsrung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:95a-4: sba ba'i slad du dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:95a-5: na ma:sarba ta th'a ga te bhya:sarba mu khe bhya:sarba th'a panytsa la panytsa mu kha panytsi kha ka hr'im hr'im raksha ksha sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:95a-8: rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir dam tshig thob ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:95a-9: gsang sngags bsgrub par 'tshal na des thog ma kho nar bdag gi snying po 'di lan gcig brjod par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:95a-12: sba ba'i slad du bu lnga brgya'i 'khor can bdag de'i drung du mchi bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:95a-13: bdag mchi ba'i snga ltas ni sgrub pa po de'i lus la lha'i spos dri zhim po'i ngad 'bar bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:95a-14: spro ba'i stobs phun sum tshogs par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:95a-15: bgegs thams cad ma mchis par tshegs chung dus des dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:95a-16: ci ste bdag gi snying po 'di bsgrub par 'tshal na des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:95a-17: tha mar ba dmar ser gyi mar zangs kyi snod kyi nang du bzhag ste du ba 'thul lam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:95b-0: 'bar gyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyis la de 'thungs @95b na gyen du 'phags par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:95b-1: du ba 'thul na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:95b-2: ci ste ma grub na yang skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:95b-3: rtag tu bzlas brjod bgyis na nor 'du bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:95b-4: ba lang gi lci ba sa la ma lhung bas dkyil 'khor bgyis la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:95b-5: bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bsams nas lan brgya stong bzlas brjod bgyis na 'grub par 'gyur te gzhan du mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:95b-6: de nas thags bzangs ris la sogs pa lha ma yin gyi rgyal po rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:95b-8: bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po mang po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:95b-9: na ma:sarba ta th'a ga te bhya:sarba mu khe bhya:sarba th'a tram gi ni bo de de m'a li ni dza ti mi h'um sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:95b-11: gang la la bdag gi snying po mchog tu gsang chen drag po dam pa 'di bsgrub par bgyid pa des /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:95b-12: dpal gyi sgo mo'i sgor mchis la snying po 'di lan drug 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:95b-15: ske tshe'i 'bru bsres pa lan 'bum sbyin sreg bgyis na lha ma yin gyi gnas thams cad gtan pa ma mchis shing 'khrul 'khor ma mchis par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:95b-16: de nas bdag cag gis rim gro cher bgyis te rigs kyi bu de bzhugs par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:96a-0: yo byad thams cad kyang stsol @96a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:96a-3: sman bcud kyis len thams cad kyang stsal bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:96a-4: de nas sna tshogs phreng ba can la sogs pa dri za'i rgyal po rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:96a-6: bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'di 'bul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:96a-7: na ma:sarba ta th'a ga te bhya:sarba mu khe bhya:sarba th'a madta ma tang gi sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:96a-8: 'di ni bdag cag gi snying po lags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:96a-10: 'dis bdag cag dri za'i rgyal po zhes bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:96a-11: lha'i bde ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs myong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:96a-12: mdor na bgyi ba bgyid pa thams cad nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:96a-14: mi ma yin pa'i gnas thams cad na mchis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:96a-15: ci ste gang la la zhig bsgrub par 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:96a-16: des thog mar ri phug tu ci 'byor pas mchod pa bgyis la snying po 'di 'bum bzlas brjod bgyis na de nas 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:96a-17: tha mar du ru ska'i 'bru mar gyi me bus la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:96a-18: aa ga ru'i yam sreg shing khri sbyin sreg bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:96a-19: de nas de'i bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:96a-20: gi wang la sngags kyis btab ste dpral bar thig le bgyis na skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:96b-0: lag mthil la @96b sngags kyis btab ste gdong la byabs na skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:96b-1: de nas mi'am ci'i [?] rgyal po ljon pa la sogs pa mi'am ci'i rgyal po rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:96b-3: bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'di 'bul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:96b-4: na ma:sarba ta th'a ga te bhya:sarba mu khe bhya:sarba th'a ti ti li phu sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:96b-6: 'di ni bdag cag gi snying po lags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:96b-7: 'dis bdag cag mi'am ci'i rgyal po zhes bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:96b-10: rol mo'i sgra 'byin cing thams cad du 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung du mchi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:96b-12: klu'i gnas thams cad du kun gyis kyang bkur to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:96b-13: snying po 'dis ci la yang mi brjod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:96b-14: ci ste gang la la zhig bsgrub par 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:96b-15: des gcig pu dgon par slong mo'i zas 'tshal zhing snying po 'di lan nyis 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:96b-16: tha mar ba lang gi lci ba sa la ma lhung ba'i sna lnga dang bsres pas dkyil 'khor bskus la ci 'byor pas mchod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:96b-17: gur gum gyi sreg blugs lan khri sbyin sreg bgyis na de nas 'grub par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:97a-0: mi'am ci'i gnas thams cad du kun gyis bkur cing gang 'dod pa de bgyid @97a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:97a-1: do; ;de nas rnam par bdud kyi bu la sogs pa nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so; ;bcom ldan 'das /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:97a-2: bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'di 'bul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:97a-3: na ma:sarba ta th'a ga te bhya:sarba mu khe bhya:sarba th'a rangk'a ri bi sha ri bi she sha ni krinta ni ku m'a ri ke ha sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:97a-5: bdag cag gi snying po 'di klu thams cad rang gi dam tshig la dgod par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:97a-6: snying po 'di'i ming thos pa tsam gyis klu thams cad bdag cag gi phyag brnyan du 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:97a-10: dug ma mchis shing phyogs phyogs su 'bros par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:97a-13: rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig snying po 'di bsgrub par 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:97a-14: des mtsho chen por zhugs la mid pa tsam nub par 'greng ste snying po 'di lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:97a-15: de nas mtsho de nyid nyin gcig bzhin skam mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:97a-16: klu'i gnas thams cad kyang 'bar bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:97a-17: rang gi gzugs kyang ston to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:97a-18: bgegs gzhan brgya dag kyang bgyid de de la 'jigs par mi bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:97b-0: de nas mtshan ma de dag byung nas tha mar ba lang gi @97b lci ba sa la ma lhung ba de nyid kyis rgya mtsho'i ngos su dkyil 'khor bskus la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:97b-2: lag na rdo rje [?] la ci 'byor pas mchod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:97b-4: nye ba'i dug thams cad las klu'i rgyal po brgyad bgyis la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:97b-5: de nas ske tshe'i 'bru re re nas khrag gis bskus te sbyin sreg bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:97b-6: de nas klu thams cad lhags nas dam pa longs shig ces mchi na skrag par mi bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:97b-8: phyag brnyan dag tu gyur cig ces brjod par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:97b-9: de bzhin du gyur cig ces smras nas mi snang bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:97b-10: de slan chad ci 'tshal ba de bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:97b-11: de nas 'jigs su rung ba la sogs pa srin po'i rgyal po thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:97b-13: bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po dbul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:97b-14: na ma:sarba ta th'a ga te bhya:sarba mu khe bhya:sarba th'a kam k'a ri ni lu ndi ni sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:97b-15: bdag cag gi snying po 'dis mi thams cad kyi gzi brjid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:97b-17: sems can thams cad gdul bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:97b-20: mi rgyu ba dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gsum po dag na ci yang dgon pa ma mchis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:97b-22: gang la la zhig 'di bsgrub par 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:98a-0: des dur khrod du du ba 'thul bar zas su sha 'tshal zhing @98a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:98a-1: gos sngon po bgos la lag tu ral gri thogs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:98a-2: snying po 'di lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:98a-3: tha mar 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:98a-4: ci 'byor pas mchod pa bgyis la nam phyed kyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:98a-5: de nas srin po'i bdag po gang yang rung ba zhig mchi bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:98a-6: de la 'jigs par mi bya bar mchod yon stsal na bdag la 'dod pa'i gzugs can gyi dngos grub byin cig ces brjod par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:98a-7: des ral gri de blangs nas stsol bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:98a-8: de nas lha'i 'gro ba can du 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:98a-9: ngo mtshar gyi las rnam pa sna tshogs bgyid par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:98a-10: de nas drang srong chen po mes byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:98a-12: bdag cag kyang sgrub pa po rnams la sman pa'i slad du dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'di 'bul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:98a-13: na ma:sarba ta th'a ga te bhya:sarba mu khe bhya:sarba th'a ka b'i la dzye ti ni ra na da bing+ga la lo tsa na sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:98a-14: bdag gi snying po 'di ni re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:98a-15: 'dis bdag kyang bkug te dbang du mchi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:98a-18: rtag tu bzlas brjod bgyis na nor 'du bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:98b-0: snying po 'dis rtag tu bza' ba'i sbyin @98b sreg bgyis na bza' ba 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:98b-1: mdor na rdzas gang gis sbyin sreg bgyis pa'i rdzas de 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:98b-2: ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na ri'i rtse mor mchis la slong mo'i zas 'tshal zhing snying po 'di lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:98b-3: tha mar ci 'byor pas mchod de me thab bgyis la rgya shug gi yam sreg shing zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:98b-5: mar la smyugs nas lan khri sbyin sreg bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:98b-6: de nas grub par 'gyur te dga' mgur las rnams byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:98b-7: de nas sprin gyi phreng ba can la sogs pa rlung lha rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar bas btud de 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:98b-9: bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:98b-10: sgrub pa po dngos grub grub par 'tshal ba rnams kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:98b-11: na ma:sarba ta th'a ga te bhya:sarba mu khe bhya:sarba th'a bha ma ra bha ma re /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:98b-12: tsa ba li tsa pa li /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:98b-13: ke he ra mbi ni sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:98b-14: 'di ni bdag cag gi snying po mchog lags te 'dis bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' bzhin bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:98b-15: byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis lung dang mi 'gal bar bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:99a-0: @99a *// byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa des blog [?] mar snying po 'di lan gsum bzlas brjod bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:99a-1: de nas bdag cag gis de'i bgyi ba thams cad gnang bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:99a-2: ci ste gang la la zhig bsgrub par 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:99a-3: des zas mi bza' bar lan khri bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:99a-4: tha mar ci 'byor pas mchod de ba lang gi lci ba sa la ma lhung bas dkyil 'khor lnga bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:99a-5: kha dog sna tshogs kyi ba dan bdun bzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:99a-6: de nas ba dan 'gul gyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyis na de nas 'grub par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:99a-8: dgag pa la sogs pa las rnams dga' mgur bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:99a-9: de nas skar ma'i rgyal po zla bas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:99a-11: bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:99a-12: gdung ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:99a-13: dpal yang dag par 'jog par bgyid pa 'bul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:99a-14: na ma:sarba ta th'a ga te bhya:sarba mu khe bhya:sarba th'a tsandra k'anti bi shuddha ham ga sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:99a-16: bdag cag gi snying po 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa rnams kyi gdung ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:99b-0: rtag tu bzlas brjod bgyis na bkra @99b mi shis pa rnams sel to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:99b-2: rtag tu skal ba bzang po stsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:99b-3: ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na des zas su 'o ma 'thungs shing padma'i rdzing du zhugs la snying po 'di lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:99b-4: tha mar zla ba nya la shal lam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:99b-5: mar sar las zla ba bgyis la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:99b-6: padma'i 'dab ma'i phrag tu stsal te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:99b-7: mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod bgyis na; nam phyed dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:99b-8: nyi ma shar ka'i tshe 'od zer 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:99b-9: byung nas kyang sgrub pa po'i khar 'jug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:99b-10: de nas 'khor lo bzhin du 'khor 'khor nas kun nas 'khod par gyur te 'dug go; de nas grub par 'gyur te gdung ba ma mchis pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:99b-11: nam mkha' la mchi bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:99b-12: bdag gi gzhal med khang du bskal bar gnas shing lha'i bde ba dang ldan pa gnas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:99b-14: rgyal srid la sogs pa gang 'dod pa stsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:99b-15: de nas nyi ma la sogs pa gza' thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:99b-17: bdag cag gi snying po gzi brjid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:99b-18: stobs thams cad pa zhes bya ba mchis te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:99b-19: sgrub pa po rnams la phan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:99b-22: nad med pa bgyi ba'i slad du de dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir 'bul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:100a-0: na ma:sarba ta th'a te bhya:sarba mu khe bhya:sarba th'a siddhi bi dyo @100a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:100a-3: sgrub pa po gang la las snying po 'di bzlas brjod ba gyis na de la nad thams cad mi 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:100a-4: rtag tu bzlas brjod bgyis na gzi brjid can du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:100a-5: ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na des 'bab chu'i 'gram gyi bye ma la mar me kha lnga bus la snying po 'di lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:100a-6: de nas mer sbyin sreg bgyis la nyi ma nub kyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:100a-7: de nas nyi ma gang yang rung ba zhig mchi bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:100a-8: de la mchod yon la sogs pa stsal la gang 'dod pa de bslangs la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:100a-9: de bzhin du gyur cig ces smras nas mchi bar 'gyur te gang 'dod pa de bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:100a-10: gzhal med khang gang yang rung bar mchis so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:100a-11: de nas klu'i rgyal po chu lha klu'i rgyal po du ma dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:100a-13: bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:100a-14: na ma:sarba ta th'a ga te bhya:sarba mu khe bhya:sarba th'a aa ba ma ba ti bi ra dza sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:100a-15: gang la la zhig byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa des snying po 'di bzlas brjod bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:100a-16: de rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:100b-0: spyod pa gtsang ma thams cad la blo mngon sum du 'gyur @100b ro; ;ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:100b-1: rgya mtsho chen por mid pa nub tsam du zhugs la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:100b-2: snying po 'di lan 'bum phrag bcu gcig bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:100b-3: de nas tha mar rin po che sna bzhi las klu bgyis la ci 'byor pas mchod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:100b-4: klu'i rgyal po gang yang rung ba zhig gnas kyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyis la mchod yon stsal te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:100b-5: ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du byin cig ces brjod par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:100b-6: de phan chad gang bsgo ba de bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:100b-7: de nyid du zhugs nas lo mang por gnas so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:100b-8: de nas khyab 'jug gis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:100b-10: bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:100b-11: na ma:sarba ta th'a ga te bhya:sarba mu khe bhya:sarba th'a ae ka ae ka /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:100b-16: bdag gi snying po ni 'di lags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:100b-17: 'dis sdang ba thams cad bzlog par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:100b-20: gnod pa thams cad ma mchis par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:100b-21: gang la la zhig rtag tu dran par bgyid na de'i blo nyams par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:100b-22: ci ste snying po 'di bsgrub par 'tshal na ri'i rtse mor mchis la lan lnga 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:100b-23: tha mar grog mkhar gyi rtse mo'i sa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:101a-1: pas khyab 'jug gi gzugs lag pa bzhi pa bgyis te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:101a-2: lag pa g-yon pa gcig na 'khor lo /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:101a-3: g-yas pa gcig na dbyug to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:101a-5: g-yas pa gcig na dam pa sbyin pa bgyis la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:101a-6: ba lang gi lci ba sa la ma lhung bas dkyil 'khor bgyis la ci 'byor pas mchod la kha nub phyogs su bltas te mchis la khyab 'jug gi gzugs 'gul ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:101a-7: dung sgra 'byung ba'i bar du bzlas brjod bgyis na 'grub par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:101a-8: dgos pa gang bsams pa de thams cad bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:101a-9: de nas yi dvags kyi bdag po drag pos byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:101a-11: bdag la mchog tu gsang ba'i snying po mchis te; des na bdag las drag po bgyid pa'i slad du sems can thams cad kyi drag po zhes bgyi bar 'tshal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:101a-13: snying po 'dis bdag rgyu ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:101a-14: mi rgyu ba dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gsum ma rungs par bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:101a-17: bdag gi snying po 'di dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir 'bul lo; ;na ma: sarba ta th'a ga te bhya: sarba mu khe bhya: sarba th'a h'um phat/
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:101a-19: bdag gi snying po 'di ni thams cad pa'i nor lags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:101b-0: byang chub sems dpa'i @101b spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa gang la la dran par bgyid na bdag rtag tu de'i slad bzhin du 'brang bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:101b-1: yi dvags kyi tshogs thams cad lhan cig bka' bzhin bgyid do; ;'jig rten gsum yang dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:101b-3: der dur khrod du lus thal bas byugs la mi mgo'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:101b-4: thod pa'i phreng ba'i rgyan thogs shing lag na mdung rtse gsum pa thogs te khri'i zur shing khyer la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:101b-5: stag wags kyi sham thabs 'tshal zhing slong mo'i zas bab bab tu 'tshal la snying po 'di lan bzhi 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:101b-6: de nas du ba 'thul ba'i dur khrod du ba lang gi lci ba sa la ma lhung bas dkyil 'khor bgyis te mdung rtse gsum pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:101b-7: khri'i zur shing bzhag la ci 'byor pa'i mchod pa bgyis nas sha chen gyi bdug pa bsreg cing mtshan thog thag brjod pa bgyis na dag po nyid yi dvags mang pos bskor nas 'jigs 'jigs lta chen po'i gzugs can du mchi bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:101b-8: de la mi 'jigs par bgyi zhing mchod yon stsal lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:101b-10: dgos pa thams cad kyang bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:101b-11: de'i slad bzhin du bka' bzhin sdod pa lhur len to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:101b-12: de nas 'byung po'i bdag po dbang ldan gyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:102a-2: bdag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir snying po 'bul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:102a-3: na ma: sarba ta th'a ga te bhya: sarba mu khe bhya: sarba th'a bonne te datta bhu ta aa dhi pa ti sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:102a-5: bdag gi snying po 'di ni phun sum tshogs pa thams cad stsal pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:102a-7: rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig snying po 'di rtag tu dran par bgyis na; bdag rtag tu de'i slad bzhin du 'brang bar bgyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:102a-10: ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na des skyed mos tshal dben pa'i gnas su zas nub mo 'tshal zhing snying po 'di lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:102a-11: tha mar ci 'byor bas mchod par bgyi ste tsandan gyi bdug pa bsreg cing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:102a-12: gtor ma rgya chen po yang phul /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:102a-13: mar gyi mar me brgyad kyang phul la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:102a-14: nyi ma nub pa nas brtsams te nam phyed kyi bar du brjod par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:102a-16: dgos pa thams cad kyang bsgrub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:102a-17: sman bcud kyis len kyang stsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:102a-18: de nas lha mo dka' thub zlog gis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la phyag btsal nas 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:102a-20: bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:102b-0: na ma:sarba ta th'a ga ta bhya: sarba mu khe bhya: sarba th'a au @102b ma ye sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:102b-2: bdag gi snying po 'di ni skal ba bzang po thams cad bgyid pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:102b-6: gi wang la sngags lan gcig btab te bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:102b-7: rtag tu bzlas brjod bgyis na skal ba bzang por 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:102b-8: ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na des dbang ldan gyi snying po las cho ga rgyas pa nyis 'gyur du sbyar te bsgrub par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:102b-9: de nas gza' chen po smin drug gi bus byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:102b-11: bdag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir yid rab tu dga' zhing rang gi snying po 'bul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:102b-12: na ma: sarba ta th'a ga te bhya: sarba mu khe bhya: sarba th'a he ku m'a ra dzva li ta m'urti tsa ru tsi tra ma ba ra sv'a h'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:102b-13: bdag gi snying po 'di ni thams cad kun tu skrag par bgyid pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:102b-14: gang la la zhig rtag tu dran par bgyid na de la 'jigs pa thams cad mi 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:102b-15: glags 'tshol ba'i gdon thams cad kyis glags mi thong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:102b-16: rma bya'i mjug ma la sngags kyis btab ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:102b-17: gdon gyis btab pa la bya ba bgyi zhing de'i bdug pa'ang bsregs na sos par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:102b-18: ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na des thog mar byis pa khye'u brgyad bkur sti cher bgyis te 'tshal ma stsal la de dag zas gang la sred pa stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:103a-0: de nas ma mo'i khyim du lag na mdung @103a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:103a-1: thung thogs la gzhon nu'i gzugs can gyis snying po 'di lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:103a-2: tha mar ma mo'i dkyil 'khor de nyid du mchod pa ci 'byor pas mchod pa bgyis te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:103a-3: 'bab chu'i 'gram gnyis kyi 'jim pa las gzugs brnyan bgyis la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:103a-4: snying gar mdung thung btsugs te /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:103a-7: de slan chad ci 'tshal ba de bgyid do //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:103a-19: 'dis ni bdag cag rgya che zhing stug pa'i sprin gyi dra bas nam mkha'i dkyil khebs par byin gyis brlabs nas lo tog thams cad bsgrub par bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:103a-20: sa chen po 'di yang char pa'i rgyun chen pos tshim par bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:103b-1: byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gang la la zhig rtag tu dran par bgyid na de la chus phongs pa'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:103b-5: des byams pa dang ldan pas zla ba drug tu zla ba shar ba nas brtsams te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:103b-6: zla ba shar ba'i bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:103b-7: zla ba drug tshang nas ci 'byor ba'i mchod pa bgyis te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:103b-8: rgya mtsho chen po bzhi las chu blangs la bum pa zhabs nag po med pa bkang ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:103b-12: nam chu las dbu ba 'byung zhing gyen du 'thor ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:103b-14: 'brug gi sgra grag gi bar du bzlas brjod bgyis na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:103b-15: lha'i bu char sprin gang yang rung ba zhig mchis nas chu bar snang la 'thor ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:103b-16: de nas grub par 'gyur te 'dod pa bzhin dgos pa thams cad bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:103b-17: de nas glog sprin 'joms pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:103b-20: glog phreng bzang zhes bya ba rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de 'di skad ces smras so //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:104a-9: phyogs bzhir kha dog ji lta bzhin du bum pa bzhi bzhag pa la mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod bgyi'o //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:104b-6: bdag cag gis bsrung ba dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:104b-11: de nas ci 'byor pa'i mchod pa bgyis te /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:104b-16: de nas bdag cag ri'i rgyal po gang yang rung ba zhig mchis te 'di skad ces smra'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:104b-18: tshur shog nged kyi gnas su 'dir /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:104b-20: des kyang nam bdag dgos te dran pa'i tshe tshur shog cig ces smras na de bzhin du gyur cig thams cad bgyi yi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:104b-21: khyod su la yang ma slong zhig ces smra'o //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:106a-9: 'bras kyi 'o thug lan tshva can gzhag par bgyi ste /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:106a-13: gang la la zhig rtag tu dran par bgyid na bdag de'i drung du mi mchi ste /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:107a-22: na ma: sarba ta th'a ga te bhya: sarba mu khe bhya: sarba th'a ku m'a ri /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:107b-0: tsi tra ke ta ga dre shakti @107b dh'a ri ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:107b-4: gang la la zhig snying po 'di dran par bgyid na bdag de'i slang bzhin 'brang zhing dgos pa thams cad bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:107b-5: ci ste snying po 'di bsgrub par 'tshal na des kha lho phyogs su bltas la lag pa g-yon par mdung thung thogs shang lan bzhi 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:107b-6: de nas de bzhin du ci 'byor bas mchod la 'bru'i la du rgya shug tsam gyis mtshan thog thag sbyin sreg bgyi'o //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:107b-13: na ma: sarba ta th'a ga te bhya: sarba mu khe bhya: sarba th'a ru dhi ra be t'a li /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:107b-16: bhinda bhinda tsa munti bid tse sv'ah'a /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:108a-15: snying po 'di bsgrub par 'tshal na des lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:108b-15: bdag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po dbul lo //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:109a-0: gang la la zhig snying po 'di @109a *//

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:109a-3: ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na slong mo'i zas bza' zhing lam gyi bzhi mdo'am /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:109a-5: de nas ci 'byor pas mchod de /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:109a-7: de nas 'jigs 'jigs lta chen po'i chung mas srul po'i gzugs 'dzin cing mchi bar 'gyur te /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:109a-10: de nas chu klung chen po gang g'a la sogs pa chu klung chen po thams cad kyis /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:109a-11: byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la phyag btsal te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:109a-14: bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:109a-20: de nas ci 'byor pas mchod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:109b-0: 'bras @109b s'a lu btags pa'i phye ma zho dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:109b-2: de slan chad chu klung rnams su zhugs kyang 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:109b-4: ji srid 'dod kyi bar du gnas shing bu bzhin rjes su spyod la gang 'tshal bde stsol to //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:109b-7: bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:109b-10: dgos pa thams cad la rab tu dga' ba'i yid kyis gnang ba stsal bar bgyi'o //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:109b-13: pheg rngob pa bgyid cing steng du bla re bzung la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:109b-16: dge 'dun rjes su dran pa stsal bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:110a-0: ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na des thog ma dgon pa chen por zhugs la zas su 'bras bu bza' zhing snying po 'di lan nyis 'bum @110a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:110a-2: de nas ci 'byor pas mchod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:110a-3: du ru ska'i bdug pa bsreg cing mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod bgyis na dri za'i rgyal po gang yang rung ba zhig mchis nas mgo la me tog gi phreng ba stsol gyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:110a-4: de nas dri za'i nang du kun gyis bkur bas 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:110a-5: dri za'i gnas thams cad du zhugs kyang nam yang yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:110a-6: mdor na gang 'tshal ba de stsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:110a-7: de nas rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po tog la sogs pa rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje gal bde logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:110a-9: bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:110a-10: na ma: sarba ta th'a ga te bhya: sarba mu khe bhya; sarba th'a ga ga na sam bha be ga ga na goo ri /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:110a-11: au t'a tti ke hi ri khi ri sa nas ra ba ham ga mi sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:110a-13: 'di ni rig sngags 'chang ba thams cad kyi snying po lags te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:110a-14: 'dis bdag cag rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po zhes bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:110a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:110a-16: rim gro bgyid pa zhes bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:110a-17: mdor na 'dod pa tsam gyis dgos pa thams cad bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:110b-1: byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa gang la la zhig snying po 'di rtag tu dran par bgyid na bdag cag de la dngos grub dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:110b-3: stobs brtan pa nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:110b-4: ci ste snying po 'di bsgrub par bgyid na nges re'i rtse mor mchis la cho ga snga ma bzhin du lan sa ya bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:110b-5: de nas ci 'byor pas mchod la ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor bskus te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:110b-6: mar gyi sreg blugs lan 'bum sbyin sreg bgyis na 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:110b-7: thogs pa med par 'dod dgur 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:110b-8: de nas so can la sogs pa srin mo chen mo thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar bas btud de 'di skad ces smras so; ;bcom ldan 'das /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:110b-9: bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:110b-10: na ma: sarba ta th'a ga te bhya: sarba mu khe bhya: sarba th'a ker ka ri ko ta re pi te ke sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:110b-12: gang la la zhig snying po 'di rtag tu dran par byed na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:110b-13: de dgon pa chen po na mchis kyang rung /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:110b-14: dur khrod na mchis kyang rung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:110b-15: chu'i nang na mchis kyang rung /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:110b-16: ma'i nang na mchis kyang rung /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:110b-17: rgya mtsho'i nang na mchis kyang rung /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:110b-18: srin mo'i nang na mchis kyang rung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:111a-2: chad pa la sogs pa yongs su spang bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:111a-3: ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na des khang stong ngam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:111a-4: dur khrod chen por gcig pu bong bu la zhon zhing bslangs pa ma lags pa'i kha zas 'tshal la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:111a-5: lag na gri thogs shing ce spyang gi lpags pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:111a-6: byi la'i lpags pa'i sham thabs bgos la snying po lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:111a-7: tha ma nya sha la sogs pa ci 'byor bas mchod la ba lang gi lci ba'i bdug pa bsreg cing mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod bgyi ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:111a-8: phyogs phyogs su bya bhe ru na ti ka phyogs bzhir sgra 'byin pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:111a-9: bong bu kha nas me lce 'bar ba 'byung gi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi zhing 'jigs pa mi bgyi bar legs par 'ongs so zhes brjod la mchod yon stsal to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:111a-10: legs so zhes brjod nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:111a-11: de nas grub par 'gyur te gang 'tshal ba de bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:111a-12: bong bu la zhon zhing gang dga' bar 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:111a-13: de nas 'byung po'i rgyal po brtsegs pa la sogs pa 'byung po'i rgyal po thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar bas btung de 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:111a-15: bdag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:111b-0: @111b phan pa'i slad du dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po dbul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:111b-1: na ma: sarba ta th'a ga te bhya: sarba mu kha bhya: sarba th'a hi si ti [?] si /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:111b-6: gang la la zhig snying po 'di rtag tu dran par bgyid na bdag cag des bsgo ba bzhin du bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:111b-7: bye brag tu ni zas kyi phung stsal la don thams cad bsgrub par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:111b-8: ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na des shing ba ti'i drung du 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:111b-9: tsandan gyi bdug pa bsreg cing kha zas mi bza' bar 'byung po'i rgyal po thams cad lhags nas gser dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:111b-11: mu tig la sogs pa stsol gyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:111b-12: yang na rang gi khyim du khrid nas dngos po thams cad kyis mgron bgyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:111b-14: las rnam pa sna tshogs gzhan dag kyang bgyid do //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:111b-17: bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:111b-18: na ma: sarba ta th'a ga te bhya: sarba mu khe bhya: sarba th'a mi tsi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:111b-21: gang la la zhig snying po 'di rtag tu dran par bgyid na bdag cag de'i slad bzhin 'brang bar bgyi'o //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:112a-11: bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig snying po 'di rtag tu dran par bgyis na /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:112a-15: bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:112b-9: bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:113a-0: bdag cag kyang dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir bdud kyi stobs thams cad ba zhes bgyi ba'i snying po 'bul @113a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:113a-1: lo; ;na ma: sarba ta th'a ga te bhya: sarba mu khe bhya: sarba th'a tam gi ra sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:113a-3: gang la la zhig snying po 'di rtag tu dran par bgyid na /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:113a-6: lha chen po'i gnas su glu len gar bgyid cing rol mo'i sgra dbyangs 'byin pa dag gis yid dga' bar snying po 'di lan bzhi 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:113a-7: de nas de nyid du yo byad thams cad kyis rgya cher mchod la spos thams cad las 'dod pa'i lha'i gzugs bgyis te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:113a-8: mar gyi mar me brgyad bus la glu drug ldan nam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:113a-9: 'dab brgya ma'i dbyangs kyis mtshan thog thag tu bzlas brjod bgyis na nam phyed na dga' ma'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:113a-10: sdug ma dang lhan cig tu mchis shing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:113a-11: de'i tshe rig sngags 'chang nyid dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:113a-13: rjes su rgyu ba nyid kyang rung ste dam pa stsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:113a-14: ci ste ma grub na grong dam pa brgyad stsol to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:113a-15: skal ba bzang po mchog dang ldan zhing 'dod pa'i lha gnyis pa dang 'dra bar sa la rgyu bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:113b-0: de nas rgyal ma la sogs pa sring mo chen mo bzhi phyogs bzhi nas 'ongs te 'dug nas de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' lag na @113b rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:113b-3: de nas rgyal mas rang gi snying po smras pa /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:113b-13: ri'i rtse mor mchis kyang rung /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:113b-15: tha mar gcig pus sa phyogs gtsang ma dben par ba lang gi lci ba sa [?] la ma lhung bas dkyil 'khor byugs la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:113b-16: ba ser mo'i mar gyi mar me bus te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:113b-17: nam gyi gung la yungs kar gyis sbyin sreg bgyis na de nas 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:113b-18: skye bo thams cad kyi snying du sdug pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:113b-22: de nas rnam par rgyal mas rang gi snying po smras pa /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:114a-0: gang la la zhig bdag gi snying po 'di dran par bgyid na bdag @114a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:114a-1: rtag tu de'i slad bzhin du 'brang bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:114a-3: nad med pa phun sum tshogs par stsal bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:114a-5: ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na des yang snga ma bzhin lan nyis 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:114a-6: tha mar snga ma bzhin du bsgrub par bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:114a-7: ma grub na yang skye bo thams cad kyi snying du sdug par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:114a-8: nor chen po dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:114a-10: de nas mi pham mas rang gi snying po smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:114a-11: na ma: sarba ta th'a ga te bhya: sarba mu khe bhya: sarba th'a aanta aa dzi te sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:114a-13: gang la la zhig bdag gi snying po 'di dran par bgyid na bdag de'i bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba'i slad du rtag tu slad bzhin du 'brang bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:114a-14: ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na des snga ma bzhin du snying po 'di lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyi'o //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:114b-2: snying po 'di bzlas brjod bgyis na skye bo thams cad kyi snying du sdug pa dang /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:114b-6: tha mar ci 'byor pas mchod de /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:114b-8: tshig tsam gyis las bgyid de gzhan du mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:114b-9: de nas tam bu ras byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tsal te 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:114b-10: bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi don gyi slad du dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir rang gi snying po 'bul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:114b-11: na ma:sarba ta th'a ga te bhya:sarba mu khe bhya:sarba th'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:114b-15: bdag gi snying po 'di ni gdong bzhi pa phyogs bzhi nas byung ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:114b-20: 'bru dang bsangs dang bkra shis dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:115a-2: 'di ni bcud kyis len gyi mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:115a-4: gang la la zhig snying po 'di dus thams cad du yid la bgyid na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:115a-5: bdag 'khor dang bcas te de'i slad bzhin 'brang bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:115a-6: ci ste bsgrub par 'tshal na des 'greng yang rung /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:115a-10: bdag la rnam par dgod pa bgyis pa bzhin du skyes bu bcing bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:115a-11: gdod bzhi pa rnam par bkod la phyag rgya bcing bar bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:115a-12: de nas tshes gcig nas brtsams te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:115a-13: zla ba nya'i bar du bgyi'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:115a-14: ci 'byor pas mchod de 'bras s'a lu btags pa las padma 'dab ma brgyad pa ze ba dang bcas par bgyis la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:115a-15: snying po aom zhes bgyi ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:115a-16: dza zhes bgyi ba shar phyogs su dgod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:115a-17: bha zhes bgyi ba nub phyogs su gzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:115a-18: ma zhes bgyis [?] byang phyogs su gzhag go //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:115a-19: ha zhes bgyi ba lho phyogs su gzhag la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:115a-20: dngos grub 'tshal bas rtsva ku sha sbams pa'i steng du mchis te; nub gcig lan tshva'i sreg blugs lan khri sbyin sreg bgyis na /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:115a-22: bzlas brjod bgyis na yi ge go rims bzhin du rig par bgyi'o //
