K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:115b-0: 'di ltar khyed kyis dkyil 'khor @115b chen po 'dir rang gi snying po rnams smras shing phul ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:115b-1: rjes su yi rang ba ni /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:115b-5: snying po 'di dag ni snying po mchog gis drangs pa ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:115b-6: de bas na 'di dag ni snying po mchog gis zin pas dngos grub sbyin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:115b-7: gang la la zhig bstan pa 'di las 'das na snying po mchog gis rdo rje 'bar ba kun tu mched cing 'bar bas de'i mgo 'gems par 'gyur gyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:115b-9: de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor des mgrin gcig tu smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:115b-10: byang chub sems dpa' chen pos bka' stsal pa de bzhin du gyur cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:115b-11: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de'i tshe rdo rje ye shes chen po'i 'od zer 'phro ba las 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas lag pas lag na rdo rje las rdo rje blangs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:115b-12: ye shes las byung ba'i autpal dri ma med par byas nas ye shes chen po las byung ba'i autpal de la rdo rje gzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:115b-13: rdo rje chen po de bzhag ma thag tu de nas 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byams thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:115b-14: sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:115b-16: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di na dam pa sbyin pa'i rdo rje'o zhes sgra gcig nas gcig tu 'ur zhes grags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:115b-17: de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i snying ga nas mchog tu gsang ba'i snying po byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:116a-0: @116a *// na ma:sarba ta th'a ga te bhya:sarba mu khe bhya:sarba th'a manydzu badzra dza ya ra ti ta bi las h'um kri da na ku m'a ra sv'ah'a /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:116a-1: rdo rje'i snying bo'i h'um zhes bya ba mchog dang ldan pa byung ma thag tu de nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams de na bzhugs bzhin du phyag g-yas pa brkyang ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:116a-2: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba'i mgo la byugs nas bka' stsal pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:116a-3: rdo rje chen po legs so legs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:116a-4: stobs chen rdo rje dam pa sbyin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:116a-5: lag na rdo rje dbang bskur bar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:116a-6: dngos grub bsgrub pa rgya cher ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:116a-7: bstan pa 'di la bshad par bgyis //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:116a-8: de skad gsungs nas rdzu 'phrul che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:116a-9: sangs rgyas de dag der bzhugs bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:116a-10: 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i spyi bo nas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:116a-11: phyag rnams de dag slar bkug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:116a-12: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis gnang bas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas de'i tshe dngos grub bsgrub pa'i rim par phye ba smras pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:116a-13: thog ma nyid du ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:116a-15: dam pa'i chos kyi glegs bam gyi mdun du snying po gang yang rung ba rgya cher brjod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:116a-16: slob dpon mgu bar byas la gsol ba gdab ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:116b-0: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par bya ba'i phyir bdag la gsang sngags stsal du gsol zhes brjod par @116b bya'o; ;slob dbon la de skad ces gsol ba btab nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:116b-1: thal mo sbyar te pus mo'i lha nga sa la btsugs la lag pa stong pa ma yin pas sngags gang 'dod pa mnod par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:116b-2: byang chub kyi snying po la gnas kyi bar du'o zhes tshig tu brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:116b-3: gzhan du sngags bdag gis blangs na ni grub par mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:116b-4: de nas sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i snying po 'di dag gi spyi'i dngos grub bsgrub pa na 'di yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:116b-11: dben pa gang yang rung ba der gnas la slong mo'i zas za yang rung /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:116b-12: bslangs pa ma yin pa'i zas za yang rung //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:116b-13: gtsang mar byas shing gos gtsang ma bgos la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:116b-14: dus gsum du khrus byas shing gos lan gsum brjes te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:116b-15: snying po gang yang rung ba zhig lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:116b-18: gi wang ngam ba'i rnam lngas bkrus kyang rung /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:116b-19: ba lang gi lci ba'i phung po'i steng du gzhag kyang rung te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:116b-20: zla ba yar gyi ngo tshes nas bzung ste nya'i bar du gzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:116b-22: bdag gi gzugs tha mi dad par byas la mtshan ma byung gi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:116b-23: de la mtshan ma ni 'di dag yin te sngon ma byung ba'i chos thos par 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:116b-24: snang ba mthong bar 'gyur ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:117a-0: yid du 'ong ba'i sgra thos par @117a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:117a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa'i phun sum tshogs pa myong ba snyam du shes ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:117a-3: bdag nyid la yid ches par 'gyur ba la sogs pa'i mtshan ma 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:117a-4: de nas zla ba nya la ci 'byor pas mchod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:117a-5: rdzas de lag pa'i snyim par btsug la mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:117a-7: nyi ma 'char kar rdzas de 'bar ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:117a-10: 'bar na ni lus la bskus na rig sngags 'chang du 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:117a-11: nyi ma shar ba lta bu'i mdog can dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:117a-13: thogs pa med par 'gro ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:117a-14: 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan thams cad du rgyu ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:117a-16: du ba 'thul na sum ris byas na mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:117a-17: dro bar 'gyur na 'gro ba thams cad la dbang byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:117a-18: ma grub na las su rung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:117a-19: blon bo chen po'i srid thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:117a-20: zla ba gcig sangs rgyas rjes su dran par byed cing snying po gang yang rung ba zhig bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar ci 'byor pas mchod pa byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:117a-21: sangs rgyas kyi gzugs la blta zhing mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas na de'i gzugs de grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:117b-0: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gang yang rung ba'i mdun du bsgrubs na yang de bzhin du @117b 'grub ste gang 'dod pa de byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:117b-1: sngar spyad pa ma byas kyang gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:117b-2: de la dbus kyi yul du ni 'khor lo [?] ba bcom ldan 'das drag po chen po 'grub bo; ;lho phyogs kyi rgyud du ni lag na rdo rje drag po 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:117b-3: 'gro lding ba'i yul du ni rig sngags kyi rgyal po 'gro lding 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:117b-4: byang phyogs kyi rgyud du ni byang chub sems dpa' lag na padmo 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:117b-5: shar phyogs kyi yul du ni dam pa sbyin pa'i rdo rje 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:117b-6: skyed mos tshal chen por ni gnod sbyin gyi tshogs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:117b-8: khang stong du ni sha za dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:117b-10: dur khrod du ni ma mo rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:117b-13: srin mo la sogs pa 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:117b-14: ri rnams su ni rig sngags 'chang rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:117b-16: dgon pa chen po rnams su ni dri za rnams 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:117b-17: 'bab chu rnams su ni klu rnams 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:117b-19: shing ba ta'i drung dag tu ni 'byung po rnams 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:117b-20: byang phyogs kyi rgyud du ni gnod sbyin chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:117b-21: na da ku be ra 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:117b-22: rgya mtsho chen por ni sring mo bzhi dag 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:117b-25: grong khyer chen po rnams su ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo sgrol ma dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:117b-27: chu 'dus su ni tshangs pa 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:118a-1: du wa dang bcas par ni drag po 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:118a-2: skyes bu chen po'i gnas su ni khyab 'jug 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:118a-3: byang phyogs kyi rgyud du ni nyi ma 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:118a-4: gangs ri la ni zla ba 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:118a-5: lho phyogs kyi rgyud du ni smin drug gi bu 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:118a-6: ri sul dag tu ni lha ma yin rnams 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:118a-8: rgya mtsho chen po rnams su ni lto 'phye chen po rnams 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:118a-9: yul ma ga dh'ar ni drang srong chen po rnams 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:118a-10: mya ngam dag tu ni yi dvags rnams 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:118a-13: ri rnams su ni rin po che dag 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:118a-14: 'bab chu rnams su ni 'bab chu chen po dag 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:118a-15: yul ka ling kar ni 'byung po'i rgyal po dbang ldan 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:118a-16: gtor khung rnams su ni gnon po dag 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:118a-17: khyim gyi bar rnams su ni grib gnon rnams 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:118a-19: gnas rnams su ni brjed byed kyi gdon rnams 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:118a-23: ri ma la ya'i steng du ni gshin rje 'khor dang bcas pa 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:118a-25: srin po chen po rnams ni yul lang ka dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:118b-2: nam mkha' lding gi dbang po thams cad ni rgya mtsho chen por 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:118b-3: gangs khrod du ni dbyar sprin gyi lha'i bu rnams 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:118b-5: ri rtse brgyad pa'i rtse mor ni klu bdud 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:118b-7: de ltar na sems can gyi bsam pa tha dad pas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis yul gyi dbang nye bar bzung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:118b-8: dus kyi dbang gis gsang sngags 'grub pa gdags par mdzad cing rnam par gzhag par mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:118b-9: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros kyis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:118b-11: dus zhes bya ba 'di ni chos gang gi tshig bla dvags yin /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:118b-12: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:118b-13: 'jam dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:118b-15: dus zhes bya ba 'di ni chos gang gi tshig bla dvags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:118b-17: ji srid du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho la gzhes pa de srid du gsang sngags 'grub par khong du chud par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:119a-0: rgya mtsho chen po na 'gro ba thams cad kyi bkod pa'i snying po @119a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:119a-1: zhes bya ba'i nor bu rin po che chen po yod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:119a-2: nor bu rin po che rgya mtsho chen po na gnas pa de srid du chu skam par mi 'gyur te nor bu rin po chen po mang po dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:119a-3: rgya mtsho chen po de yang skam la gnas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:119a-4: chu la gnas pa'i mi dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:119a-5: mi ma yin pa rnams kyi 'tsho bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:119a-6: kha cig tu ni btung bas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:119a-7: kha cig tu ni gnas kyis /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:119a-8: kha cig tu ni rin po che rnam par 'geng pa nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:119a-9: rnam pa thams cad kyi bar gyis 'tsho bar 'gyur zhing nam yang nye bar mi 'tsho bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:119a-10: nor bu rin po che chen po'i rgyal po de med par gyur na chu med pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:119a-11: dngos po thams cad med pa'i phyir rgya mtsho chen po yang srog chags thams cad kyi 'tsho bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:119a-13: de bzhin du ji srid de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa de srid du gsang sngags 'grub par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:119a-14: de bzhin gshegs pa de sems can gyi bsam pa tha dad pa'i dbang nye bar bzung nas dngos grub sbyin par mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:119a-15: de bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas dngos grub de yang nye bar 'tsho bar mi 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:119a-17: ji tsam du shing yod pa de tsam du 'bar te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:119a-18: shing med na me mi 'bar ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:119b-0: de bzhin gshegs pa bzhugs pa de srid du gsang sngags 'grub @119b bar khong du chud par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:119b-5: byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par sangs rgyas 'byung bar brtson par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:119b-7: de la byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gsang sngags spyad pa la mkhas par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:119b-9: de la gsang sngags spyad pa gang zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:119b-11: yid yongs su mi skyo ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:119b-13: yi dam la brtan par gsang sngags kyi gzhi re re nas spyad par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:119b-17: de sems rtse gcig kho nas 'jug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:119b-18: gnyis su ni ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:119b-19: gcig pu gnyis su med par dpen par nyams dga' ba 'du 'dzi med pa rang gi yul na gnas shing sngar bsnyen pa bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:119b-20: de nas zla ba tshes nas brtsams te nya'i bar du bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:119b-24: gi wam la sogs pa gang rung ba zhig blangs la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:119b-25: ba'i lci ba sa la ma lhung ba gcin dang bsres pas dkyil 'khor byugs la bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:119b-27: 'khor lo rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:119b-28: ci ste ral gri bsgrub na des rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:119b-29: ci ste lig bu mig dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:120a-1: sogs pa bsgrub na mdung rtse gsum pa'i rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:120a-2: ci 'byor pas mchod la nyi ma nub kar dmar thag chad nas nyi ma shar gyi bar du'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:120a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:120a-4: byang chub kyi sems mngon du byas la bsrung ba byas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:120a-5: byams pa'i sems kyis rdzas de blangs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:120a-6: mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas na nam phyed dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:120a-7: nyi ma 'char khar rdzas de nges par 'bar bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:120a-8: 'bar na yan lag bkra la sogs pa rig sngags 'chang ba thams cad 'ong zhing de dag gis bsod nams ji lta ba bzhin du dbang bskur nas rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal por 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:120a-10: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:120a-11: 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan du mar rgyu ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:120a-12: sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba la brtson pa'i yid du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:120a-13: gi wang la sogs pa yang de bzhin du bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:120a-14: 'bar na nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:120a-15: gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su spyad pa spyod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:120a-16: bskal par gnas shing rgyu ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:120a-17: 'dod dgur thags thegs med par 'gro bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:120a-18: shi 'phos nas kyang rnam par dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:120b-0: du ba 'thul na @120b mi snang ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:120b-2: 'dod pa bzhin du 'dzam bu'i gling du rgyu ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:120b-3: longs spyod kyi drug cha 'phrog par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:120b-4: shi 'phos nas kyang dga' ldan gyi lha'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:120b-5: dro bar gyur na 'gro ba thams cad la dbang byed pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:120b-7: sgyu rtsal thams cad shes par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:120b-8: shi 'phos nas kyang 'dzam bu'i gling 'di nyid du gnod sbyin gyi pho brang lcang lo can du skye bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:120b-9: gnod sbyin gzhon nu'i lus 'thob bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:120b-10: ci ste ma grub na yang nges par yul thob par 'gyur ro; ;de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:120b-12: bcom ldan 'das 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po 'jig rten pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:120b-13: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i gsang sngags thams cad kyi gong nas gong du gyur pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:120b-15: pha rol gnon pa dpag tu med pa gsang sngags kyi mgon po'i sgrub pa nyon cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:120b-17: thog ma nyid du sngar spyad pa byas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:120b-21: rdo rje 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur ba des bcom ldan 'das kyi dkyil 'khor bris la rin po che dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:121a-0: sman thams cad kyis bkang ba'i bya ma bum bcu drug 'khor @121a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:121a-1: los bsgyur ba chen po'i sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas pa dag gis spyi bor dbang bskur bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:121a-2: dus thams cad du lha'i gzugs mthong bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:121a-3: de nas ri'i rtse mor song la slong mo'i zas bza' zhing dus gsum du khrus bya /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:121a-4: dus gsum du gos brjes la shing ltar mi smra bar bya zhing gtsang spra dang gtsang spra spyod pa phun sum tshogs par byas la bcom ldan 'das 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po chen po sa ya phrag gsum bzlas brjod bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:121a-5: de nas rdo rje drag po'i snying po lan bzhi 'bum bzlas brjod bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:121a-6: de nas gser mgar gso sbyong gzung bas gser gyi 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:121a-7: drug pa nor bu me shel gyi lte ba can 'od zer 'bar bas bskor ba byed du bzhug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:121a-8: de nas spos chus bkrus te mchog sbyin pa'i rdo rje'i sngags kyis gzi brjid bskyed par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:121a-9: de nas rdo rje drag po'i snying pos bskul bar byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:121a-10: bskul nas 'khor lo sgyur ba'i sngags kyi dkyil 'khor gyi dbus na tsandan gyi sgrom bu yod pa'i nang du bcug la bzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:121a-11: de nas bde bar gshegs pa'i sku mtho gang tshad kyi mchod rten khri bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:121a-12: de nas zla ba tshes nas brtsams te aa ga ru'i bdug pa bsreg cing zla ba nya'i bar du bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:121b-0: @121b bzlas brjod dpag tu med pa byed cing bslangs pa ma yin pa'i zas za bas ci 'byor pas mchod pa byas la ba'i lci ba sa la ma lhung bas dkyil 'khor bskus te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:121b-1: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su 'khor los bsgyur ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:121b-2: de na 'dug pa'i 'khor lo lag pas blangs la 'khor lo las 'od zer rnams ma byung gi bar du mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:121b-3: de dag gis sgrub pa po snang bar byas nas lus 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:121b-5: nyi ma 'char kar sa g-yo bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:121b-7: lha'i spos chu dang 'dres pa'i me tog gi char bar snang las 'bab par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:121b-9: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rig sngags 'chang thams cad 'dus te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:121b-10: de dag gis dbang bskur nas lha'i rin po che'i gzhal med khang chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:121b-12: gang dag gis mthong ba de dag dang lhan cig tu gyen du 'phags so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:121b-13: nyi ma stong bas lhag pa'i gzi brjid dang ldan zhing yid mgyogs pa'i shugs 'chang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:121b-14: 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po'i skal ba dang ldan pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:122a-3: rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gong nas gong du 'gyur ba'i rig sngags 'chang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:122a-4: lha'i bu mo bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'i g-yog 'khor can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:122a-6: pheb rdob pa snyan cing yid du 'ong ba'i sgra 'byin pa dag gis mngon par bstod par gyur nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:122a-8: de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa chen po bya ba bla na med pa thob par bya ba'i phyir 'khor lo de la zhon te 'gro zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:122a-9: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rnams su mchod pa'i don du skad cig re re la yang me tog thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:122a-19: gzhal med khang thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:122a-20: rol mo'i sgra yid du 'ong ba thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:122a-25: lha'i bu mo thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:122a-26: lha'i dpag bsam gyi shing ljon pa rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:122a-27: lha'i sman gyi shing ljon pa rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:122a-30: mu tig gi phreng ba thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:122a-31: dus thams cad du lha'i khang pa brtsegs pa rnams 'bul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:122a-32: yi dvags rnams kyi nang du ni bza' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:122b-0: @122b rgyan dag gi sprin mngon par sprul pa byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:122b-2: rgyal ba'i sras mos pas spyod pa gzhal du med pa'i sa thob pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:122b-3: grags pa chen po dang ldan no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:122b-4: de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:122b-5: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stobs bskyed pa thob pa rnams ma gtogs par gzi brjid dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:122b-13: spobs pa de dang mnyam pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:122b-14: lhag pa gang yang med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:122b-15: zhi ba'i blo gros kyis smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:122b-17: 'khor los sgyur ba chen po 'di ci ltar bkod pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:122b-18: rdzu 'phrul mngon par grub pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:122b-20: bsam pa zad mi shes pas re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:122b-22: gsang sngags kyi 'khor los sgyur ba chen po 'di ji tsam du mi mnyam pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:122b-23: mnyam pa ni ngo mtshar to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:122b-24: 'jam dpal; gang dag rdzu 'phrul chen po rtag tu rjes su dran pa de dag kyang yon tan gyi tshogs dpag tu med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:122b-25: de skad ces smras pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:122b-26: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:123a-0: ji skad smras pa de bzhin @123a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:123a-1: no; ;bcom ldan 'das 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po ni yon tan gyi chos dpag tu med pa dang ldan no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:123a-5: sa chen po 'di ni sems can thams cad nye bar 'tsho yang sa chen po 'di na mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:123a-6: de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po yang mi rtog rnam par mi rtog go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:123a-8: sa chen po ni rnam par mi rtog pa'i phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:123a-12: sa chen po 'di ni lo tog thams cad skyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:123a-13: sems can thams cad kyi re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:123a-15: de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po yang thos pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:123a-19: bsgrungs pas kyang rnam pa thams cad du byang chub sems dpa' spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa rnams kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:123a-22: de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:123a-23: klu bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:123a-24: bsam gtan bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:123a-25: bdud bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:123b-0: las bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid do zhes gang dag yang dag par smra bas smras pa de dag ni 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po 'di nyid la @123b yang dag par smra bas smras pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:123b-2: bsam gyis mi khyab pa nyid de dag thams cad ni 'di las 'byung ba'i phyir ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:123b-5: 'jig rten las 'das pa'i bsam gtan kha cig bsam gtan bsgrub pa'am //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:123b-7: 'dod pa'i khams kyi dbang phyug gam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:123b-9: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos dang ldan par gyur pa rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po 'di nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:123b-10: rdzu 'phrul rnam par sprul pa sna tshogs kyang ston to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:123b-12: khyod kyis rnam grangs 'dis kyang 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po 'di ji ltar gsang sngags thams cad kyi bdag po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:123b-15: 'di las gzhan pa'i go 'phang mchog gzhan la med par rig par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:123b-16: 'khor lo la ji lta ba bzhin du ral gri dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:123b-18: mdung rtse gsum pa gdengs pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:123b-31: dbyug to rnam ba sna tshogs bsgrub par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:124a-0: ldong ros la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyang bsgrub @124a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:124a-2: de dag gi dngos grub thams cad kyang de bzhin du rnam pa gsum mo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:124a-3: ci ste ril bu bsgrub par 'dod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:124a-4: bcom ldan 'das 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i sngags lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:124a-7: aud ma gupta'i rtsa ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:124a-8: aandha pushpi ka'i rtsa ba rnams cha bsnyams te gcig tu bsres la ril bu rgya shug gi tshig gu'i tshad du byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:124a-9: lcags sna gsum gyis bskor la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:124a-11: ral gri lag na thogs shing ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:124a-12: sku gzugs kyi mdun du zas mi bza' bar de khar bcug la nub kha dmar thag chad nas bzung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:124a-15: ser por snang ba'i 'od zer byung ba'i bar du bzlas brjod byas na sgrub pa po snang bar byed cing grub par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:124a-16: nyi ma shar ba'i mdog can dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:124a-20: 'dod pa'i gzugs can du gyur pa de shi 'phos nas kyang rgyal po dbang bsgyur gyi gnas su skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:124a-22: sku gzugs med par gyi na bsgrubs kyang dngos grub sbyin par mdzad do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:124a-23: ci ste ri mo'i sku gzugs bsgrub par 'dod na bram ze'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:124b-0: rgyal rigs kyi bu mo gzugs @124b bzang ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:124b-1: yan lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:124b-2: gso sbyong bzung ba zhig la rin la ma brtsegs par nyos pa'i shing bal 'khal du bcug la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:124b-5: yud tsam bzang po la yan lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i tha ga pa 'thag tu bcug ste ba glang gi lci ba sa la ma lhung bas dkyil 'khor bskus la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:124b-8: bdug pa la sogs pas mchod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:124b-12: thag pa'i thags cha rnams kyang ba'i rnam lnga dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:124b-15: thams cad kyang rdo rje drag po'i snying pos lus bsrung bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:124b-16: ri mo mkhan gso sbyong gzung ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:124b-21: yan lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa zhig sa phyogs dben zhing dug med pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:124b-22: gtsang ba me tog bkram par aa ga ru'i bdug pa bsreg cing tshon rtsi sar pa sbyin dang ma 'dres pa'i tshon gyis 'drir gzhug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:124b-24: yang na sgrub pa po bdag nyid kyis bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:124b-27: ba dan bsgreng zhing sil snyan dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:124b-28: dga' bar 'gyur ba'i sgra mang po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:124b-29: shis pa rgya chen po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:124b-30: bkra shis pa brjod pa rnams kyis mchod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:124b-32: sgrub pa po byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:125a-2: sngags bgrang nor bu 'phyang ba dang bcas par ri mo mkhan gyi rgyab na 'dug cing bcom ldan 'das 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po'i gzugs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:125a-5: yi ge rnams kyang bsam zhing bcom ldan 'das 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po bri bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:125a-6: padma dkar po la bzhugs pa; gser gyi kha dog gi mdog can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:125a-7: me lce 'bar ba lang long du gyur pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:125a-9: ras kyi sham thabs mnabs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:125a-10: na bza' bla gos dar la mnabs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:125a-11: ting nge 'dzin du snyoms par zhugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:125a-13: mtshan thams cad dang ldan par bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:125a-14: de'i g-yas rol tu dam pa sbyin pa'i rdo rje gur gum gyi kha dog can phud bu lnga pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:125a-15: rdo rje dang bcas pa'i autpal sngon po lag pa g-yon pa na thogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:125a-16: rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:125a-17: dar ram ras kyis smad g-yogs bgos pa; bla gos dar la gyon pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:125a-18: me lce 'bar ba dang bcas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:125a-21: bcom ldan 'das 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po'i g-yon rol tu ha cang yang mi ring bar de'i zhal du blta ba la brtson pa byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:125b-0: cod pan thogs @125b shing cod pan 'gul ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:125b-3: rdo rje dang bcas pa'i thal mo sbyar ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:125b-5: de'i mdun du snga ma bzhin du lan sa ya bzlas brjed bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:125b-6: tha mar ci 'byor pas mchod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:125b-8: lag na 'khor lo thogs shing mtshan thog thag aa ga ru'i yam sreg shing zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:125b-10: mar la smyugs pas sbyin sreg byas na nam phyed dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:125b-11: nyi ma 'char kar nges par ri mo'i gzugs las 'od zer dag 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:125b-12: de dag gis snang bar byas na grub par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:125b-13: snga ma bzhin gar dga' ba der 'gro'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:125b-14: ri mo'i gzugs de mthong ba tsam gyis kyang sdig pa thams cad las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:125b-15: ri mo mthong ba'i mthu yis ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:125b-16: mtshams med lnga la sogs pa'i las //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:125b-17: sdig pa sngon chad gang byas pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:125b-18: de dag thams cad byang bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:125b-19: 'khor los bsgyur ba gzi po che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:125b-20: mgon po dran pas 'dod pa bzhin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:125b-21: 'jig rten kun gyi don bsgrub pa'i //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:125b-22: 'phrin las mdzad pa smos ci dgos //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:125b-23: sngags pas ri mo'i gzugs mdun du //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:125b-25: 'dod bzhin dngos grub mchog sbyin pa //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:125b-26: dpal ni mngon sum mthong bar 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:125b-27: sngags pas gang yang rung bar ni //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:125b-28: zad mi shes pa'i gter mthong zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:125b-29: nam mkha' la yang 'gro bar l'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:126a-2: gi wang dang ni ldong ros dang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:126a-3: lig bu mig kyang de bzhin te //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:126a-4: kha zas mi bza' gceng byas la //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:126a-5: mkhas pas lan 'bum bzlas brjod bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:126a-6: sngar bsnyen bya ba med par yang //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:126a-8: 'jig rten gsum na mi snang zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:126a-9: skye bo kun gyis thub mi 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:126a-10: ri dang nags tshal bcas pa yi //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:126a-11: sa rnams kun tu rnam par rgyu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:126a-12: bskal par gnas shing gzi brjid che //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:126a-13: rga dang 'chi ba rnam par spangs //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:126a-16: drag po chen po lag na rdo rje'i sgrub pa ni 'di yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:126a-17: rang gi yul na gnas shing gtsang mar byas la byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa'i yid du byas te ri'i rtse mor song la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:126a-18: slong mo'i zas bza' zhing gos lan gsum brjes la dus gsum du khrus bya zhing byang chub sems dpa'i sngom pas bsdams te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:126a-19: gus shing de dang mthun pa'i cha byad du byas la mi smra bar sa ya chig 'bum bzlas brjod bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:126a-27: mdung thung blangs la ba'i rnam lngas bkrus shing spos chus kyang bkrus la shubs dang bcas par lag na thogs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:126a-31: zla ba gcig bzlas brjod bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:126b-0: nyal na @126b yang 'khor los bsgyur ba chen pos bsrung bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:126b-1: de nas zla ba phyi ma la tshes nas brtsams te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:126b-2: nya'i bar du bdog pa thams cad yongs su btang bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:126b-3: de nas zla ba nya la ci 'byor bas mchod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:126b-4: ba lang gi lci bas la ma lhung bas dkyil 'khor bskus la ri'i rtse mo de nyid du ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad kyi sku gzugs bzhag la mchod pa byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:126b-5: phyogs gcig tu bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:126b-6: de la shar phyogs su ni rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po yan lag bkras byin gzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:126b-7: lho phyogs su ni rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po sna tshogs sde gzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:126b-8: nub phyogs su ni rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po tog ldan gzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:126b-9: byang phyogs su ni rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po k'i la ki la gzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:126b-10: grva bzhir ni tshon sna bzhi pa'i rdo rje rtse gsum pa me lce 'bar ba dang bcas pa gzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:126b-11: dbus su ni padma 'dab ma brgyad pa ze ba dang bcas pa bris la snying po'i steng du gang bsgrub pa de bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:126b-12: de'i steng du rdzas bsgrub par bya ba gang yin pa de shing aa shattha'i lo ma'i steng du gzhag go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:126b-13: padma nas khru gang tsam gyis sa gzhi bor la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:126b-14: rdo rje rgya gram bris te der 'dug la bsrung ba bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:126b-15: 'bar ba'i bar du bzlas brjod bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:126b-17: yang na rnga bo che'i sgra sgrogs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:127a-0: yang na me tog gi char 'bab @127a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:127a-2: yang na snang ba chen pos sgrub pa po snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:127a-3: yang na me tog gi phreng ba 'gul bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:127a-4: mchod yon byin la blangs na 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:127a-5: nyi ma shar ba lta bu'i mdog can dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:127a-7: khams gzhan du mar rgyu ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:127a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod cing rim gro bya ba la mkhas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:127a-10: dbang phyug thams cad kyi gnas thob pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:127a-12: rtag tu rjes su dran par byed na mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa mi 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:127a-14: lag na rdo rje bdag nyid ston par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:127a-15: shi 'phos nas kyang lcang lo can du lag na rdo rje'i khyim du gzhon nu'i lus thob par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:127a-16: nyin gcig bzhin du snying po 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas pa'i chu 'thungs na nad thams cad med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:127a-17: gi wang la lan gcig sngags te mig la bskus na gang mthong ba de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:127a-18: so shing la sngags lan gcig btab te 'chos na 'dod pa'i zas rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:127a-19: chu'i nang du me tog kha dog ci 'dra ba bor ba de 'dra ba'i gos rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:127a-20: kha la sngags kyis btab na gang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:127a-21: smra ba de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:127a-22: lcags kyu'i phyag rgya bcings la h'um zhes bya bas dug sel to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:127b-0: @127b khros pa dang bcas pa'i mdzub mos bsdigs na bag 'khums par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:127b-1: gdon gyis zin pa la rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings la h'um zhes byangs bsdigs shing ram zhes bya ba 'bar bar byas pa tsam gyis 'bros te the tshom med do /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:127b-2: gdon gyis zin pa lag mthil du ha zhes bya ba bsams la byabs na sos par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:127b-5: bdug pa la sngags kyis btab ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:127b-6: su la byin pa de dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:127b-7: gdon drag po thams cad kyang cho ga 'di nyid kyis 'bros par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:127b-8: sngags pa dul ba'i sems dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:127b-9: slong mo'i zas bza' zhing srung ba byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:127b-10: klu'i rgya mtshor lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod byas na klu 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:127b-11: gang bslangs pa de sbyin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:127b-12: skud pa sngon po la sngags kyis btab ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:127b-13: rims kyis btab pa'i mgul par bcings na de'i mod la rims las thar bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:127b-14: mig na ba la shing ka ra b'i ra'i lcug ma blangs te lan cig sngags kyis btab ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:127b-15: zangs kyi snod la brud de mig la bskus na de'i mod la sos par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:127b-16: klad nad thams cad la ni gu gul la sngags kyis btab ste lus thams cad g-yogs la mgor gtugs na klad nad med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:127b-17: zas ma zhu bar gyur na chu la sngags kyis btab pa'i khyor chu lan bdun 'thungs na sos par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:128a-0: lto na ba la ni skud ba dmar po ldum bu ratna su rtsi'i rtsa ba dang @128a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:128a-1: bcas pa la sngags kyis btab ste rked par bcings na lto ba'i nad sos bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:128a-3: nad thams cad zhi bar byed pa gdon thams cad sel ba'i bdug pa'i rgyal po 'di brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:128a-4: zhi ba'i blo gros kyis smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:128a-6: ci las 'di dag grub pa yin par bstan tam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:128a-7: 'on te ma grub pa yang yin nam; 'jam dpal gyis smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:128a-9: rig pa'i rgyal po 'di ni rtag tu grub pa yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:128a-11: byang chub kyi sems dang bral ba ma gtogs par sngar spyad pa bya mi dgos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:128a-12: sngar bsnyen par bya mi dgos par tshe 'di la bde bar gnas par bya ba'i phyir /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:128a-13: byang chub sems dpa' rang gi lha'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:128a-14: byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa gsang sngags kyi sgo spyod pa la bye brag tu brjod pa'i bsgrub pa rnams bstan to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:128a-15: shing aarka dkar po'i rtsa ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:128a-16: ki ri kar ni dkar po'i rtsa ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:128a-17: ka ra b'i ra dkar po'i rtsa ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:128a-24: mar du bsres pa'i bdug pas ni gdon thams cad phung bar byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:128a-25: nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:128a-28: skal ba bzang po byed pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:128b-0: sngon byung @128b ba 'das pa'i dus na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyi gsung rab las bram ze blo gros ldan zhes bya ba rig byed rnams la rig byed kyi don la mkhas pa; bzo dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:128b-1: sgyu rtsal thams cad mngon par shes pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:128b-2: gsang sngags kyi don la mkhas pa zhig byung sta /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:128b-3: de ri zhig gi rtse mo la brtson 'grus brtsams nas rig pa'i rgyal po rdo rje drag po chen po 'di bsgrubs bsgrubs pa las /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:128b-5: log 'dren ma rungs pa dag gis gtses pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:128b-6: de bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs ga la ba der song ste phyin nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:128b-7: bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:128b-8: phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas bram ze blo gros ldan gyis /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:128b-9: bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas de'i tshul smos te gsol ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:128b-11: bdag 'di na ri che ge mo zhes bgyi ba'i rtse mo la brtson 'grus brtsams nas /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:128b-12: rig pa'i rgyal po rdo rje drag po chen po de lan gnyis su bsgrubs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:128b-14: bdag gis de'i dngos grub ma rnyed ma thob mi dmigs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:128b-15: rdzas cung zad cig bsgrubs na de thams cad kyang bgegs rnams kyis phrogs na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:128b-16: de la bdag gis ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:129a-2: bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs kyis bram ze blo gros ldan la gdug pa 'di dag bka' stsal cing gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag kyang gsungs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:129a-10: de'i tshe de'i dus na rig pa'i rgyal po 'di bsgrub pa'i bram ze blo gros ldan zhes bya ba byung ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod dogs sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:129a-11: yid gnyis za na khyod kyis de ltar mi blta'o de ci'i phyir zhe na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:129a-13: rdo rje 'chang spros pa med par gnas pa zhes bya ba 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi khyams 'di nyid du 'dus pa yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:129a-14: spros pa rab 'byams rgya chen po mtha' yas pa la mkhas pa des gsang sngags 'di dang bdug pa yang de rnyed de bsgrubs so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:129a-15: ci ste ri mo'i gzugs bsgrub par 'dod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:129a-16: snga ma bzhin du ri mo mkhan gso sbyong bzung bas tshon rtsi spyin dang ma 'dres pa dag gis ras la lag na rdo rje autpa la'i 'dab ma'i mdog lta bu'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:129a-17: pri yang ku'i kha dog lta bu'i mdog sngo bsangs sam; margad kyi kha dog lta bu'i sngo bsangs su bri bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:129a-19: rgyan thams cad gyi brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:129a-20: bzhin cung zad khros pa dang bcas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:129b-0: gos tshig gu gyon @129b pa; rin po che'i brag la rin po che'i phug na tshul bzhin du shis shing skyil mo krung phyed bcas te 'dug pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:129b-3: me lce 'bar ba'i phreng ba can /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:129b-4: lag pa g-yas pa na rdo rje 'bar ba dang bcas pa gsor ba bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:129b-5: de'i mgo bo'i g-yas rol gyi steng du ha cang yang mi ring bar de bzhin gshegs pa dri zhim snang dpal padmo dkar po la skyil mo krung du bzhugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:129b-6: mtshan thams cad dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:129b-7: rig pa'i rgyal po dbugs 'byin pa mdzad pa bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:129b-8: g-yon rol du de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sra bas rab tu 'joms par dbugs 'byin pa snga ma bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:129b-9: lag na rdo rje'i 'og g-yas rol du /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:129b-10: phyag brnyan sog ma'i du ba'i mdog lta bu'i gos dri ma can gyon pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:129b-11: skra kham pa gyen du 'greng ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:129b-13: dpral bar khro gnyer gyi rim pa dang bcas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:129b-15: ral gri thogs pa bka' nod pa lhur len pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:129b-16: pus mo gnyis btsugs pa bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:129b-17: g-yon rol tu phyag brnyan ma pus mo btsugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:129b-19: ral gri so gcig pa yu ba can dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:129b-20: zhags pa lag na thogs ba snga ma bzhin du bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:129b-21: dben pa dug med par de'i mdun du zas dkar gsum bza' zhing /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:129b-22: gos dus gsum du brjes la lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:129b-23: tha mar ci 'byor pas mchod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:130a-2: sbrang rtsi la smyugs pas mtshan thog thag sbyin sreg byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:130a-4: nyi ma 'char kar ri mo'i gzugs las 'od zer dag 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:130a-5: yang na ri mo'i gzugs 'gul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:130a-6: yang na me tog gi phreng ba 'gul lo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:130a-7: snga ma bzhin du grub par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:130a-9: rtag tu ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na skal ba bzang po mchog dang ldan zhing nad thams cad las thar bar bya ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:130a-10: 'jigs pa thams cad rnam par spangs par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:130a-13: 'jigs pa'i me'i snying po chen po stobs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:130a-25: lha ma yin pas mchod pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:130a-26: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i bsgrub pa ni 'di yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:130a-29: smyung ba yang bya mi dgos par ri'i rtse mor song la lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:130a-30: tha mar ci 'byor pas mchod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:130a-31: ske tshe'i 'bru'i sreg blugs dug dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:130b-0: lan tshva dang bsres pa lan sum 'bum sbyin sreg byas na mtshan mo h'um zhes bya ba'i sgra chen po grag cing snga ma bzhin du 'grub par @130b 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:130b-1: grub nas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams du mar rgyu ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:130b-3: gzi brjid mtshungs pa med par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:130b-5: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ma gtogs par de bas lhag par su la yang med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:130b-6: rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na 'byung po thams cad kyis mi thub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:130b-7: lha ma yin gyi khung gi sgor song nas khros te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:130b-8: lan khri bzlas brjod bya zhing sbyin sreg kyang snga ma bzhin byas na lha ma yin gyi gnas thams cad gtan pa med par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:130b-9: ci 'dod pa bzhin yongs su spyod cing 'dod pa bzhin du rang 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:130b-11: ci ste gter chen po 'byung bar 'dod na zas mi bza' bar snying po 'di lan khri bzlas brjod byas la tha mar shing ka ra b'i ra'i lcug mas lan gsum bsnun na rang 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:130b-12: rtag tu rjes su dran par byed na skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:130b-13: khros pa'i mdun du phyag rgya bcings la lan nyi shu rtsa gcig brjod na dang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:130b-14: byis pa gdon gyis zin pa thams cad kyis mthong ba tsam gyis thar bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:130b-15: gdon chen po thams cad la ni gzugs byas la rkang pa g-yon pas mnan te lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:130b-16: gdon de tshig cing sgra 'byin cing 'bros par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:130b-17: dris pa myur du smra bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:131a-0: ci ste pha rol la gnod par byed par 'dod na ba @131a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:131a-1: ru ra'i shing bu sor drug pa dag gcig la ming nas brjod cing sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags la nam phyed na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:131a-3: sgo'i steng du btsugs nas khyim du gnod pa chen po 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:131a-4: yams kyi nad chen po yang 'byung ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:131a-5: yid kyis ni zhi bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:131a-6: ci ste ri mo'i sku gzugs bsgrub na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:131a-7: ras la bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje 'od kyi kha dog dbyar gyi sprin 'dra ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:131a-12: dpral bar khro gnyer gyi rim pa 'chas pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:131a-13: rkang pa g-yon pas sa mnan te 'dug pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:131a-14: rkang pa g-yas pa'i rdog pas bsnun pa ltar 'dug pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:131a-15: lag pa g-yon pa'i mdzub mos bsdigs mo byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:131a-16: lag pa g-yas pas khro bo'i rdo rje mi bzad pa 'phen pa ltar 'dug pa bri bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:131a-18: rdo rje gtsug tor gyi gzugs su bsgyur ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:131a-19: rtag tu mnyam par gzhag pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:131a-21: byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa'i yid du gyur pas sa phyogs dben par /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:131a-22: dug med par mchod pa rgya cher byas la ri mo mkhan gso sbyong gzung ba 'drir gzhug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:131a-23: rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen por dbang bskur ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:131a-25: spro ba dang bcas pa 'drir gzhug go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:131a-26: gzhan ni gang gis kyang ma yin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:131b-0: dkyil 'khor ma mthong @131b ba; gang la la zhig gis ri mo'i gzugs mthong na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:131b-1: de'i mod la de nad rnam pa gnyis kyis btab par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:131b-6: zhi ba'i blo gros kyis smras pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:131b-9: gang gi yon tan gyi khyad par 'di lta bu bstan pa'i snying po mchog /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:131b-10: don chen po dang ldan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:131b-11: mthu chen po dang ldan pa 'di ngo mtshar to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:131b-13: snying po mchog 'di ni gang zhig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:131b-17: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po; sra ba'i yon tan rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:131b-18: mthu la ni mtha' med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:131b-20: lag na rdo rje 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'jigs pa'i me las byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:131b-21: ma dul ba thams cad 'dul ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:131b-22: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:131b-23: byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:131b-24: bstan pa mchog tu kun tu bsrung bar smon lam btab pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:131b-25: sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su rdzogs par byed pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:131b-26: 'jig rten gyi khams mtha' yas rgya mtsho rab 'byams rnams su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi smon lam sgrogs pa'i sgo la 'jug pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:131b-27: thams cad du sngon du rgyug pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:132a-1: mchod pa byas te gu gul gyi ril bu rgya shug gi tshig gu tsam 'bum sbyin sreg byas na 'grub par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:132a-4: rgya mtsho'i ngog su song ste ri mo'i gzugs bris la slong mo'i zas sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:132a-5: bslangs pa ma yin pa'i zas bza' zhing mid ba nub pa tsam du chur zhugs la lan gsum 'bum bzlas brjod bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:132a-6: tha mar ci 'byor pas mchod la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:132a-8: 'khor lo lag na thogs shing dug dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:132a-10: yungs kar bsres pas lan sum khri sbyin sreg byas na 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:132a-11: rgya mtsho las sgra 'byung zhing bskams par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:132a-14: las thams cad nus par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:132a-16: lce 'bab pa la yang lan cig bsdigs pa tsam gyis med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:132a-19: gnod pa 'byung ba thams cad la lam gyi bzhi mdo 'am; shing drung gcig yod pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:132a-22: grong khyer gyi sum mdor ri mo'i gzugs bris la rgya cher mchod la spos dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:132a-23: me tog gis mchod pa'i bum pa yungs kar gyis bkang la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:132a-24: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i sngags bzlas brjod bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:132b-0: snying po snying gar gzhag la ri mo'i gzugs de la shis @132b pa snyan pa rgya chen po brjod pas mngon sum du dga' bar byas te dbang bskur bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:132b-1: yungs kar de dag gis ni gnod pa thams cad dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:132b-4: sems can dpag tshad tsam na 'khod pa thams cad kyis ri mo'i gzugs de mthong na yang de'i mod la zhi bar 'gyur ro ////
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:132b-5: 'phags pa lag na rdo rje dbang bskur ba /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:132b-7: de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba'i blo gros la 'di skad ces smras so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:132b-9: rig pa'i rgyal po 'di dag gi spyi'i bsgrub pa'i rim par phye ba nyon cig /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:132b-11: de la sgrub pa po rig pa'i rgyal po gang yang rung ba sgrub par 'dod pas rig sngags gdon par bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:132b-14: yud tsam bzang po la smyung ba byas la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:132b-15: mar gyi mar me bus te ci 'byor pas mchod pa byas la ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:132b-16: sku gzugs kyi mdun du rig pa'i rgyal po 'jigs med mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:132b-17: nang par khrus byas la dri zhim pos bskus te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:132b-18: gos gtsang ma bgos la zas dkar gsum zos te dbang po gsal ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:132b-19: nyams tha mal bar gnas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:132b-20: byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa'i yid dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:133a-0: snying rje dang ldan pa'i slob dpon bla na med pa'i sbyin gnas la thal mo sbyar te pus @133a *//
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:133a-1: mo btsugs la gsol ba btab ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:133a-3: bla na med pa'i ye shes thob par bgyi ba'i slad du rig pa'i rgyal po bdag la stsal du gsol /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:133a-4: byang chub kyi snying po la gnas kyi bar du bgyi'o zhes brjod par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:133a-5: slob dpon gyis kyang thams cad du snying rje dang ldan pas ser sna med par byas la slob ma de la sbyin par bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:133a-7: dam tshig mnos nas ji skad bstan pa lta bu'i sa phyogs rnams su de dang mthun pa'i cha byad du bsgyur la ri'i rtse mo'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:133a-11: yid du 'ong ba dben pa der zas dkar gsum za ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:133a-12: 'o ma btung zhing lan sa ya bzlas brjod byas na sngar spyad pa byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:133a-13: de nas ral gri 'am; rdo rje'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:133a-17: lcags sna gsum gyi 'khor lo blangs la ba'i rnam lngas bkrus te ba lang gi lci ba'i phung po'i steng du gzhag la rdo rje drag po chen po'i snying pos bsrung bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:133a-18: de nas zla ba tshes nas bzung ste nya'i bar du bzlas brjod bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:133a-19: de nas gang yang rung ba zhig blangs la spos chus bkrus te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:133a-20: ba lang gi lci bas la ma lhung bas dkyil 'khor bskus la snga ma bzhin du dkyil 'khor bris te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:133a-21: ci 'byor pas mchod la shing aa shvattha'i lo ma'i steng du gzhag la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:133b-0: @133b mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:133b-2: nyi ma 'char kar nges par 'bar zhing rig sngags 'chang thams cad 'dus te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:133b-3: de dag gis bsod nams ji lta ba bzhin du dbang bskur nas rig sngags 'chang du 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:133b-5: 'jig rten gyi khams du mar rgyu ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:133b-6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro; ;ci ste ma grub la brtul zhugs ma nyams na de bzhin du lan gsum du bsgrub pa byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:133b-7: mtshams med pa'i las byas pas kyang nges par 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:133b-8: rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na tshe ring bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:133b-9: sman la bzlas brjod byas te 'thungs na nad med par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:133b-10: mar la sngags kyis btab te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:133b-11: zan za kar 'thungs na lo khyud 'khor du lus brtan par 'gyur ro; ;bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs kyi mdun du mig btsums te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:133b-12: lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gzugs kyis dge ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:133b-14: de bzhin du rna ba bkab ste bzlas brjod byas na yang thams cad thos par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:133b-15: nyal kar mal du zhugs la mig la lan brgya rtsa brgyad sngags te nyal na snang bar 'gyur zhing thams cad mthong ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:133b-16: nyin mo ji lta ba ltar mtshan mo yang de bzhin no //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:133b-17: so shing la lan gcig sngags te 'chos na ma bslangs bar zas rnyed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:134a-2: gi wang la lan gcig sngags te mig la bskus na skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:134a-3: spos la bzlas brjod byas te bskus na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:134a-4: gang dag gis dri tshor ba de dag dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:134a-5: dgra mthong na phyag rgyas bcings la lan cig brjod na dgra dang bral bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:134a-7: me tog la sogs pa la sngags kyis lan cig btab te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:134a-8: gang la byin pa de dbang du byed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:134a-9: ci ste g-yul ngor 'jug par 'dod na skyes bu bcing ba byas la zhugs na g-yul ngor rgyal bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:134a-10: ci ste dmag rengs par bya bar 'dod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:134a-11: be kangka ta'i shing gi me bus la gru tshal gyi yam sreg shing gis lan khri sbyin sreg byas na dmag rengs par byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:134a-12: gnod pa thams cad la mngar gsum gyi sreg blugs lan sum khri sbyin sreg byas na zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:134a-13: thal bas ni rdzi char gcod do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:134a-15: mtshon gyis ni lce 'bab pa bzlog go /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:134a-16: skud pa sngon pos ni 'byung po'i gdon zhi bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:134a-18: shing ka ra b'i ra'i lcug mas sbyin sreg byas na zhi bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:134a-19: gdon chen po la yang de bzhin du bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:134a-20: byis pa gdon gyis zin na 'bras s'a lu btags pa las gzugs byas la ske tshe'i 'bru dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:134b-0: phub @134b ma'i me bus pa'i nang du sbyin sreg byas na dus thams cad du ming tsam gyis gdon thams cad 'gros par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:134b-1: rims kyis btab pa la lag pa g-yon pa la sngags kyis btab ste mgo la gzhag na rims nad sel to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:134b-2: nad thams cad bsal bar 'dod na sman thams cad bsogs la ba ru ra'i shing gi me bus te lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sreg blugs sbyin sreg byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:134b-3: de phyin chad nad thams cad sel to //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:134b-4: ci ste ri mo'i gzugs bsgrub par 'dod na ras skra med pa ma dras pa la snga ma bzhin du ri mo mkhan gso sbyong bzung ba la sbyin dang ma 'dres pa'i tshon rnams kyis rig pa'i rgyal po 'drir gzhug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:134b-5: rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:134b-6: cod pan mgul la thogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:134b-7: padma dkar po la 'dug pa; rgyal po chen po'i cha byad 'dzin //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:134b-8: me lce 'bar ba'i phreng ba kun nas lang long du gyur pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:134b-9: lag pa g-yon pa na rdo rje thogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:134b-10: g-yas pas dam pa sbyin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:134b-11: skyil mo krung du bzhugs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:134b-13: sgrub pa po la gzigs par bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:134b-14: de'i 'og rol tu sgrub pa po lag na po phor thogs shing de'i gdong du blta ba la brtson pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:134b-15: tshul dang mthun pa'i cha byad can pus mo btsugs pa bri'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:134b-16: de'i mdun du lan sa ya bzlas brjod byas na snga ma bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:134b-17: rig pa'i rgyal po spyir bsgrub pa'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:135a-2: lag na rdo rje'i bu smon lam chen po la dbang thob pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:135a-3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid du gnas pa rnams kyi spyi'i bsgrub pa ni 'di yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:135a-4: snga ma bzhin du 'khor los bsgyur ba chen po'i cho gas gsang sngags gang yang rung ba mnos la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:135a-5: ji skad brjod pa'i gnas kyi nang nas rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu ngogs su song la lan sa ya bzlas brjod byas na sngar spyad pa byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:135a-6: de nas zla ba tshes nas bzung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:135a-7: rdzas gang bsgrub pa de blangs la zla ba nya'i bar du bzlas brjod bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:135a-8: de nas ci 'byor pas mchod de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:135a-9: ba lang gi lci ba sa la ma lhung bas dkyil 'khor bskus la bsrung bar bya ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:135a-10: gu gul gyi yam sreg shing zho dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:135a-12: mar las smyugs pas mtshan thog thag sbyin sreg byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:135a-14: nyi ma 'char kar nges par 'grub par 'gyur te rdzas de 'bar bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:135a-15: de blangs la rdo rje'i rigs su rdo rje gzhon nu'i lus 'thob bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:135a-18: ci ste ma grub na yang las thams cad nus par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:135a-19: shi 'phos na yang lcang lo can nam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:135a-20: longs spyod chen po'i khyim du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:135a-21: rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:135b-0: lag na rdo rje la blta zhing @135b bzlas brjod byas na sdig pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:135b-1: lus thams cad la byab ba byas te mnyal na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:135b-2: rmi lam na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mthong zhing de nyid du gzungs kyang 'thob po; ;zla ba spyang kis zin pa'i tshe ba ser mo ma smad spu mthun gyi mar blangs la zangs kyi snod du bcug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:135b-3: tsandan gyis dkyil 'khor byas la der gzhag ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:135b-4: zla ba la mi blta bar dngos grub rnam pa gsum byung gi bar du bzlas brjod byas la de 'thungs na thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:135b-5: 'bar na nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:135b-6: du bar 'thul na mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:135b-7: dro bar gyur na 'gro ba thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:135b-8: ci ste ri mo'i gzugs bsgrub par 'dod na cho ga snga ma bzhin du ri mo mkhan byang chub tu sems bskyed pas sbyin dang ma 'bres pa'i tshon rnams kyis skra med pa'i ras la gzhon nu gang yang rung ba zhig 'drir gzhug ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:135b-9: rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:135b-10: phud bu gsum gyis mgo brgyan pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:135b-12: ral gri 'od 'bar ba'i dbus na 'dug pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:135b-13: lag pa g-yon pa na rdo rje thogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:135b-15: lag pa g-yas pas sgrub pa po la dbugs 'byin pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:135b-16: gser gyi kha dog lta bu'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:135b-17: bri yang ku'i ka dog ltar sngo bsangs bri bar bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:135b-18: de'i mdun du mchod pa chen po byas te bsgrub pa brtsams na snga ma bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:136a-1: po'i bu na da ku be ra lag na rdo rje dga' ba'i bsgrub pa ni 'di yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:136a-4: smyung ba bya mi dgos par lag na be con thogs shing dgon pa chen por zhugs la lam mi bzur mi smra bar lus la glang po che'i lpags pa bgos la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:136a-5: de dang mthun pa'i cha byad du bsgyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:136a-6: lag na rdo rje drag po'i snying po'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:136a-7: 'khor los bsgyur ba chen pos bsrung ba byas la slong mo'i zas bza' ba'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:136a-8: zas mi bza' bar lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:136a-9: na da ku be ra nyid 'ong zhing dam pa stobs te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:136a-10: dam pa gang 'dod pa de sbyin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:136a-11: klu'i mtshor zhugs la lan khri bzlas brjod byas na klu byung ste gang 'dod pa de sbyin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:136a-12: lha ma yin gyi khung sgor lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas na lha ma yin gyi bu mo nyid byung nas 'jug par byed de /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:136a-13: sman bcud kyis len la sogs pa gang 'dod pa de sbyin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:136a-14: ci ste mi 'dod na de nyid du de dag dang lhan cig tu 'dug cing dbang phyug thams cad kyi bde ba thob pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:136a-16: lus de nyid kyis yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa mthong ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:136a-18: shi 'phos na yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag par skye bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:136b-0: @136b rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na mthong ba tsam gyis srin po dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:136b-2: sha za'i gdon la sogs pa thams cad ring ba bas kyang ches ring du 'bros par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:136b-3: zhi ba'i blo gros; mdor na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:136b-5: cho ga zhib mo gzhan nas 'byung bas bsgrubs kyang rung ste ngas par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:136b-6: de nas 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal ba'i bsgrub pa yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:136b-8: dur khrod du thal bas lus bskus te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:136b-9: lag na mdung rtse gsum pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:136b-10: rdo rje thogs la slong mo'i zas bza' zhing yul rgyu ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:136b-11: gnas med par rgyu ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:136b-14: nang gtsang bar mngon par dga' ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:136b-17: srog la mi blta bar byas la ri dvags kyi dbang po'i lpags pa'i sham thabs bgos te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:136b-18: snying po 'di lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:136b-19: de nas mtshan gcig yod pa'am /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:136b-22: zla ba nya la snga ma bzhin //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:136b-24: mtshan gcig thog thag bzlas brjod bya //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:136b-25: nam phyed dam ni nyi shar kar //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:136b-26: rdzas de gzhon nu yongs 'gyur zhing //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:136b-28: grub na nam mkha' spyod yul 'gyur //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:136b-29: rnal 'byor tshe la bskal par gnas //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:136b-30: 'jig rten kun tu rnam par rgyu //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:137a-3: gsang sngags grub pa dang 'dra ba ni 'jig rten gsum po dag na su yang med do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:137a-4: ma bsgrubs kyang las rnams 'grub par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:137a-5: phyag rgya bcings te gdon thams cad la bltas na de'i mod la gdon gyis gtong ngo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:137a-6: rims kyis btab pa la bltas na rims las sos par 'gyur ro; ;dogs pa thams cad du rang gi cho ga zhib mo'i cho ga'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:137a-7: gzhan gyi cho ga zhib mo'i cho ga'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:137a-8: gang yang rung bas byas kyang nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:137a-11: lag na rdo rje dga' ba khro bo zla ba'i thig le'i bsgrub pa ni 'di yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:137a-13: rgya mtsho chen por mid pa nub tsam du chur zhugs la /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:137a-15: stag lpags kyi sham thabs bgos la /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:137a-20: tha mar ci 'byor pas mchod de zla ba nya la thod ze'u ka bcings shing bsrung ba byas te /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:137a-22: nyi ma 'char kar nges par 'grub ste nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:137b-0: gzi brjid @137b mtshungs pa med par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:137b-1: grub pa thams cad kyang de las ring du 'byor par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:137b-4: sha za la sogs pas kyang zil gyis gnon par mi nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:137b-5: mkha' 'gro mas rgyas btab na rgya'i gzugs kham phor kha sbyar gyi nang du bris te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:137b-6: sngags kyis btab la nad pa la bstan na rgya bshig pa byas par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:137b-7: tshangs pa'i srin po'i gdon gyis zin na dur khrod kyi sol bas gzugs sam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:137b-8: ming bris la shing sha la ta ka'i lcug mas gzhu'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:137b-9: yang na ba lang gi rnga ma'i srad bu h'um zhes bya ba dang bcas pas bsdigs na de'i mod la sgra cher ngus te 'bros so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:137b-11: gang yang rung ba'i cho gas sbyor ba byas kyang de lta de ltar 'grub par 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:137b-12: gzhan gyi cho ga zhib mo'i tshogs byas kyang gdon mi za bar 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:137b-13: lan gcig bzlas brjod byas kyang rung /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:137b-14: bzlas brjod ma byas kyang rung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:137b-15: rjes su dran pa nyid kyis 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:137b-18: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi stobs las byung ba stobs dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:137b-19: pha rol gnon pa dpag tu med pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:137b-20: lag na rdo rje'i rigs su skyes pa; stobs po che'i bsgrub pa ni 'di yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:137b-23: smyung ba bya mi dgos la sbags kyang rung /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:137b-24: sbags pa ma yin pa yang rung /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:138a-2: mi thod kyi phreng ba thogs shing khri'i zur shing thogs pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:138a-3: dur khrod na gnas pa thal pas lus bskus la gang du yang rung bar snying po 'di lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:138a-4: tha mar de nyid du ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor bskus la bsrung ba byas te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:138a-5: rdzas gang yang rung ba zhig blangs la mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas na nam phyed dam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:138a-7: de thogs nas thogs pa med par 'gro ba'i rig sngags 'chang du 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:138a-8: rig sngags 'chang ba thams cad kyis 'di'i stobs la zil gyis gnon par mi nus so //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:138a-9: byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu la gnas pa rnams dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:138a-10: spyod pa thob pa'i rig sngags 'chang grub pa rnams ma gtogs par 'di dang mtshungs pa su yang med do //

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:138a-14: 'jigs pa thams cad du yang dran pa nyid kyis thams cad zhi bar byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:138a-15: lha ma yin gyi khung du 'jug par 'dod na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:138a-16: shing sha me'i be con thogs pa lha ma yin gyi khung sgor lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:138a-17: tha mar ci 'byor pas mchod la /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:138b-0: ske tshe'i 'bru bsres bas lan khri sbyin sreg byas pas lha ma yin gyi gnas thams cad du bskal pa'i me ltar @138b 'bar bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:138b-1: be con de la lan bdun gyi sngags kyis btab ste sgo de la bsnun na lha ma yin gyi bu mo thams cad 'byung ste /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:138b-2: de dag gis sgrub pa po de rang gi khyim dag tu 'jug par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:138b-3: sman bcud kyis len la sogs pa thams cad kyang sbyin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:138b-5: gzhan gyi cho ga zhib mo'i tshogs byas kyang 'grub bo //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:138b-6: khro bo'i rgyal po 'di ni rang bzhin gyis grub pa ste bzlas brjod byas pa tsam gyis thams cad byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:138b-9: phyag brnyan thams cad spyi'i bsgrub pa 'di yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:138b-11: gos dri ma can gyon pa /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:138b-17: sil snyan rnams la mkhas pas khang stong ngam /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:138b-18: shing drung gcig yod par 'gro yang rung /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:138b-24: snying po 'di dag sum 'bum bzlas brjod bya'o //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:138b-25: tha mar ba lang gi lci ba sa lam lhung bas dkyil 'khor bskus la me tog bkram ste ci 'byor pas mchod la lcags au ra mo las gri bya rog so byas pa dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:138b-26: mi'i skra'i zhags pa khru bcu gnyis pa'am /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:138b-28: khru gang ba thogs la mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:138b-30: nyi ma 'char kar nges par 'bar bar 'gyur te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:139a-2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:139a-4: 'jig rten gsum po yang bcings nas khrid de 'ongs na sems can phal pa rnams lta ci smos /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:139a-5: rtag tu rjes su dren par byed na rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:139a-7: shi 'phos nas kyang lha'i nang du skye bar 'gyur /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:139a-8: nges par byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:139a-11: phyag brnyan ma lag na rdo rje'i rigs su skyes pa rnams kyi spyi'i bsgrub pa ni 'di yin te /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:139a-12: gcig pu gnyis su med par khang stong ngam /

K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:139a-15: tha mar ci 'byor pas mchod de gri bya rog gi so lta bu'i yu ba can dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:139a-16: zhags pa lag na thogs la mtshan thog thag bzlas brjod byas na /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:139a-19: rig sngags 'chang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su rgyu ba dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:139a-21: lan tshva las gzugs byas la spos dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:139b-0: gnas dben pa dug med par gzhag la gcig pu mtshan thog thag @139b lag pas brang du bsnun cing bzlas brjod byas na de bzhin du nges par 'grub ste gang 'dod pa'i dam pa de sbyin par byed do //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:139b-1: tsher ma aa pa marga'i so shing la lan cig sngags kyis btab ste 'chos nam bslangs par zas rnyed par 'gyur ro //
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:139b-2: mdor na cho ga gang dang /
K12acip-k_lha_sa-087-001:139b-3: gang gis bsgrub pa de dang /
